product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Title: Worth the Price: Collagen Mask for Hydrated, Plump Skin Overnight
Review Comment:
Despite being on the expensive side, the Collagen Mask has quickly become a favorite in my skincare routine. The two-part design makes it easy to apply, and the results are amazing—my skin feels softer, smoother, and more hydrated after each use. I highly recommend giving this one a try!

Here’s why I love it:

1. Easy to Apply:
The mask comes in two parts, which makes it much easier to adjust and fit comfortably on my face. No more struggling with a single, unwieldy mask—this split design ensures a better, more precise fit.

2. Effective Results:
I’ve only used it twice, but I can already tell that I absolutely love it. After applying the mask, I leave it on overnight (since the label suggests at least 4 hours of use), and when I wake up, the mask has become clear and almost invisible. It feels like the collagen has fully absorbed into my skin overnight, leaving my face feeling plump and refreshed.

3. Hydration and Rejuvenation:
In the morning, my skin feels noticeably hydrated and rejuvenated, with a smoother texture. I can tell it’s working to help nourish and revitalize my skin, which is a huge plus.

The only downside is the price, but given the results I’ve seen after just a couple of uses, I believe it's worth trying.

But the real difference in my skincare routine has been EVIL GOODS Whipped Beef Tallow and Honey Balm, you can buy it here

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Title: Works great for young, dry skin.
Review Comment:
I followed the directions, and used a serum before applying. It does move a tiny bit, but if you’re patient and hold it in places it doesn’t stick well, like your eye sockets by your nose, it will eventually do its thing within a short time.

The mask is large enough, but still small to where there are gaps of your face that go uncovered. I used the mouth, and eye pieces to cover the tiny areas of my face that the mask didn’t reach. Even overlapping the mask, my skin still absorbed everything. I have sensitive, and dry skin with semi-large pores. There is a distinct smell, but it didn’t bother me or my skin at all. When applying, the mask will be surprising more slippery coming from the package than when placing on your face. You do need to be careful with the mask, because it can be easily punctured or ripped if you are too rough trying to get it to reach beyond its limits. However, it easily goes back to its form if you don’t completely rip it, so just be careful. Punctures aren’t the end of the world and don’t change the efficiency of the mask.

After taking it off the next morning, I did see the difference between the skin on my face the mask reached, to the skin it didn’t. The mask made my skin hydrated, and softened my tired eye bags along with other tiny lines on my face. As other reviewers have mentioned, it does leave your skin shiny yet feeling sticky. I just splashed my face with water to make it less sticky from the mask residue, and that was enough for me to feel okay.

Overall, I recommend for occasional use, not daily or even weekly at their price point. There are other products that will absorb collagen into your skin much better, and cover your whole face without taking hours. However, if you have a special next-day occasion, or just want to pamper yourself because your skin needs the extra hydration, I do recommend mixing these in with your routine.

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Comment:
My skin always freaks out in fall and gets super dry, so I decided to hop on the viral trend and bought these masks, and Y'ALL. The hype is real. I've only used one so far (and only managed to keep it on for 3 hours before I had to take it off), and there's a very noticeable difference in the texture and hydration of my skin already! I'm not confident that it would stay on at night because I roll around quite a bit, so I put this on during the day as I was watching tv, and it stayed on just fine. Definitely gives you that glassy, glowy look and I'm sure with continued use I'll see more benefits.

Knocking off one star because they are pretty delicate and I ripped the top portion of the mask when I tried to pull it up slightly to reposition it, but very happy with the purchase. Will definitely be using the subscribe option on these!

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Title: A Treat for My Skin—Instantly Hydrating and Plumping!
Review Comment:
This collagen face mask is absolutely fantastic! I’ve been using it weekly for the past month, and it’s quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Comment:
So I've finished my pack and from start to finish:

1st mask, PERFECT!! FIT LIKE A GLOVE!! The ease of application was just awesome! Left my skin SUPER hydrated and left my skin soft and the shine on for about 2 days before my skin dried out again and applying moisturizer more frequently but didn't feel the same.

2nd mask, easy application, but didn't leave as much of the glow I was expecting from the first time around. Skin felt moisturized, but did nothing for my pores.

3rd mask, a bit difficult to put on to try and get t to fit like the others did so easily. Left on for 8 hours and skin was super hydrated and cool to the touch, but still pores remained the same and the glow went away after one day.

Wearing the last mask as we speak and it did NOT want to go on as well as the others did. Keeps sliding around so much that I'm just letting it stay wrinkled up because I can't do anything to get it to stay like I have with the others.

I still love these masks!! It helps with needing a cool moisturizer for your routine! Especially when I'm hot, this just feels SO GOOD on my skin.

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Comment:
I know they’re expensive. But they’re worth it. So worth it. My skin leans more toward the dry side, but not horribly so. I only use these 1-3x/mo and they WORK. I sleep in them and take them off first thing in the morning. I’ve also worn one on a long flight. My skin is so glowy and soft not just right when I take it off, but for several days after.

Application is easy, the mask itself can tear a little bit here and there but it doesn’t damage the integrity of it on your face.

So so worth it. Get them!

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Comment:
Ok update-
I decided to just go full boar with this and did all 4 masks in 1 week.
I slept with them all night (or as long as they would stay on my face) and after the third, I am seeing the results. Just like with anything, it has to get into your system before you start really getting the effects.
This raised it up to a 4 star. Reason it’s not 5 is the mask size. I really don’t think I have a large face but the mask does not fit well. I have to modify it quite a bit to get the coverage I need. The eye area is the worst and needs some improvement.

First of all, be careful removing this from the package. It is very delicate and you can puncture the mask very easily, especially those with nails.
The mask feels like a very thin piece of gelatinous calamari. The time the mask takes to hydrate is definitely awhile which gives the skins a lot of time to absorb the product. Overnight is best if you can sleep comfortably with it.

Does it make you look like you have poreless wet plastic skin like the adverts show on social media? The short answer is no. That would require injections from a medical spa. This is not a quick fix product by any means. But it does hydrate your skin. Once the mask is clear like Saran Wrap on your skin and it is removed, there is a (not pleasing) residue that is left behind. Your fingers do not glide smoothly across the skin like you just put a serum on it. It’s like a tacky feeling like wet glue. But after you wash this off, your skin should feel pretty smooth. But the advertised product videos the influencers are doing are definitely misleading. I’m not saying this product doesn’t hydrate the skin, but I have bought way cheaper face masks on Amazon that do a better job that you do not have to leave on all night.
But it was fun to see the hype.

1 star for product longevity
1 star for appearance

The mask is not a 1 size fits all by any means. Without the little extra pieces of mask, it would not cover my face.

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Title: Not ok for super sensitive skin
Review Comment: After seeing this all over social media, I caved and bought the four pack. Full disclosure - I've been trying to ramp up my retinol use so my skin is probably more sensitive than usual but the package said "safe for sensitive skin" so I figured it was fine. The minute I applied the mask on my face it started to burn a little but that subsided after about 5 minutes.  I carefully ensured there were no air bubbles under the mask and all areas were covered.  The upper part of the face mask initially looked like it would be too small but after smoothing it on it fit...in fact, it ended up being a little too large and the edges flipped up into my hairline. I went to bed and other than not being able to sleep on my side, it was actually pretty comfortable. There was a slight cooling effect which I thought it would be nice to wear it during the summer.  The next day, the mask turned clear and my face looked shiny but not that much plumper.  I performed my morning face wash with Cetaphil gentle cleanser and the minute I put on my regular lotions my face started to sting a little and turn pink. During the entire day my face felt a little hot and itchy, similar to the day after getting a mild chemical peel. Today is day 2 after using the Biodance mask and my face feels tight and there are patches of my face that are lightly peeling. I'm pretty sure it's a reaction to the mask and it's just not compatible for my skin.  Maybe if I wasn't using retinols it would be fine but I'd rather stick with my retinol regime.  Last thing worth mentioning...the marketing states the mask turns clear after your skin absorbs the ingredients of the mask but I noticed that the whole mask turns clear no matter if it was touching your skin including the edges that were lying on top of my hair.  So I don't think the mask turning clear is an indication that your skin absorbed all the serum, it's just evaporated.

product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity Improvement, 34g x4ea
Review Title: I bought this product myself; here's my honest feedback."
Review Comment:
The Biodance Collagen Mask has gained significant attention on social media platforms like IG and TikTok, with many users raving about its benefits. Here's a breakdown of the mask's features and effectiveness:

*Key Features*
- Non-toxic and moisturizing
- Pore-minimizing and elasticity-improving
- Suitable for all skin types
- Contains collagen, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, vitamin E, and aloe vera extract

*Benefits*
- Provides intense hydration, restoring moisture levels and leaving skin smooth and full
- Promotes growth of new, healthy skin cells for skin rejuvenation
- Brightens and shields skin from environmental elements
- Offers anti-aging properties, firming skin and reducing wrinkles.

*User Experience*
- Users report feeling an instant glow after using the mask
- Skin appears brighter, plumper, and more youthful
- Some users experienced sensitivity or irritation, particularly those with sensitive skin

*Drawbacks*
- More expensive compared to other sheet masks
- May not be readily available in all regions or stores
- Some users found application challenging, and results were delayed

*Pricing and Availability*
- Typically ranges from $10 to $19 per mask
- Check packaging for expiration date, as shelf life is around 1-2 years from manufacture date

Overall, the Biodance Collagen Mask seems promising, offering hydration, firming, and rejuvenation benefits. However, consider the potential drawbacks and sensitivity concerns before trying it out.

product_title: essence | Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara | Volumizing & Lengthening | Cruelty Free & Paraben Free
Review Comment:
I’m blown away by this mascara—it’s an absolute game-changer! Lash Princess has earned its name, delivering dramatic volume and length that rivals high-end mascaras for a fraction of the cost. I love how effortlessly it glides on, coating every lash without clumping. The wand design is perfect for grabbing even the tiniest lashes, giving a full, fanned-out effect.

What impressed me most was how long-lasting it is. I’ve worn it through long days, and it holds up beautifully without smudging or flaking. The formula is lightweight, so my lashes never feel weighed down, yet the effect is bold and eye-catching.

It’s my go-to mascara for both everyday wear and special occasions. Honestly, I’ve spent triple the price on other brands that don’t deliver half the results. If you’re looking for a mascara that makes your lashes pop and stays put all day, this is the one! Highly recommend—don’t let the price fool you; it’s worth every penny.

product_title: essence | Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara | Volumizing & Lengthening | Cruelty Free & Paraben Free
Review Title: Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara Review
Review Comment:
I recently tried the Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara, and I must say, it truly lives up to its name! Here's my detailed review:

Natural Lash Effect: This mascara provides a beautiful, natural-looking enhancement to my lashes. It adds volume and length without looking overly dramatic, making it perfect for everyday wear.

Application: The brush is perfectly designed to coat each lash evenly without clumping. The formula glides on smoothly, allowing for easy layering to achieve the desired intensity. However, be mindful of applying too much, as it can weigh down your lashes.

Longevity: It stays put all day long without smudging or flaking, even through long hours and various activities. I didn't experience any issues with it running or causing raccoon eyes, which is a huge plus for me.

Formula: The formula is lightweight and doesn't weigh down my lashes as long as you apply it in moderation. It's also gentle and didn't irritate my eyes.

Packaging: The packaging is cute and practical. The unique design with the green detailing makes it easy to spot in my makeup bag.

Overall: This mascara is an absolute game-changer. It provides the natural volume and length that I love, stays put throughout the day, and doesn't irritate my eyes. I highly recommend the Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara to anyone looking for an affordable yet effective solution for naturally beautiful lashes.

product_title: essence | Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara | Volumizing & Lengthening | Cruelty Free & Paraben Free

product_title: essence | Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara | Volumizing & Lengthening | Cruelty Free & Paraben Free
Review Comment: I've been on a natural high since 2020. Natural hair, Natural Nails and Natural lashes.  Since I've stopped wearing false lashes I've been in search or a good mascara.  I wanted one that didn't cost $30 plus and this one is currently doing the trick.  I like the fullness and the length it gives my lashes.  It clumped a little but here's a trick I learned.  Put a couple of drops of clear eyes or visine or your eye drop of choice. Heck, you can drip some contact solution in it too.  Any liquid that's safe for eyes.  This thins it out a bit and then it's perfect.  You can even use this trick if you're running out and your in a pinch but still need those lashes on point. Bottom line, TRY IT! It' so cheap, why not?

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Face Serum 3.38 fl oz 100ml, Hydrating Serum for Face, Self Care, Glow Skin under Makeup, Korean
Review Title: Effective Hydration with a Touch of Slimy Goodness
Review Comment:
I’ve been using the COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence for a while now, and I’m genuinely impressed with how it’s transformed my skincare routine. This 3.38 fl. oz (100ml) essence is packed with snail mucin, which I was initially skeptical about, but it has proven to be quite effective.

Performance and Hydration: The essence delivers a powerful hydration boost, making my skin feel incredibly plump and nourished. I love how it tackles dryness and gives my skin a refreshed, healthy glow. Since incorporating it into my routine, I’ve noticed a visible improvement in my skin’s texture and a reduction in fine lines, which is exactly what I was hoping for.

Texture and Application: The texture might take a little getting used to—it’s a bit gel-like and has a slight sliminess due to the high snail mucin content. It feels a bit sticky initially, but it absorbs quickly and leaves no residue. I’ve found it layers well with my other skincare products, so it fits nicely into both my morning and evening routines. It’s not a dealbreaker, but if you’re sensitive to textures, it might be a consideration.

Ingredients and Efficacy: I appreciate that this essence is formulated with 96% snail mucin and is free from artificial fragrances and dyes. It’s clear that the formulation is designed with skin health in mind, and it feels like a luxury treatment every time I use it. The additional hydrating and soothing ingredients work in harmony with the snail mucin to deliver noticeable results.

Drawback: One minor issue I’ve encountered is with the packaging. The pump sometimes doesn’t dispense the product evenly, which can be a bit annoying. I often find myself having to pump several times to get the right amount, which disrupts the otherwise smooth application process. Also, the slimy texture might feel unusual at first, but the benefits are worth it.

Overall Impression: Overall, the COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence has been a fantastic addition to my skincare lineup. It delivers impressive hydration and repair, and the snail mucin works wonders for my skin’s health and appearance. Despite a couple of small issues with the pump and texture, the results make it a worthwhile investment. If you’re on the fence about trying snail mucin, I’d definitely recommend giving this essence a shot—it’s made a significant difference for me.

product_title: Mighty Patch™ Original patch from Hero Cosmetics - Hydrocolloid Acne Pimple Patch for Covering Zits and Blemishes in Face and
Review Title: Where has this been my whole life?
Review Comment: I'm 45 and still break out. I am SO tired of having spots to cover and I'm in grad school with a mildly disabled kid and busy life overall, no time for the dermatologist right now. Last time there they recommended an OTC face wash that helped but not 100%. I've used these on more "regular" pimples I've already tried popping but I knew there was more there and I use them on new bumps that are deep under my skin (cystic? I think) and would take a long time to surface and then heal. I don't care what dermatologists say (one of my BFFs is one) I have to pop mine to get it all out before they start to heal. Often I have a more solid blockage that needs to be removed. These have eliminated ALL that. A red spot often remains for a few days after using the patch but there was clearly white on the patch and it's no longer raised or irritated. Easy to cover with makeup. I've used this on spots and not found any white on the next day but it still reduces the swelling and irritation. My husband can't see them on me 90% of the time too. When I put them on at night I wash and moisturize and wait a few min before putting the patch on but a few times I was too tired and rushed it. They still stayed on even if the edges weren't perfect. I used these on my 11 year old whose just starting to get some mild breakouts. I have VERY sensative skin and these don't irritate me at all. I've even used them during the day on weekends to speed things up if I wasn't going anywhere. So cool noticing the white spot slowly increasing as it works. Or feeling the spot reducing on those times no white gunk is drawn out. Im even attaching a picture (sorry) to show it working. I don't know what sort of magic is in these but try them, I think you'll love them too!

product_title: Mighty Patch™ Original patch from Hero Cosmetics - Hydrocolloid Acne Pimple Patch for Covering Zits and Blemishes in Face and
Review Title: Actual Witchcraft- there are no better pimple patches!
Review Comment: I have tried a lot of pimple patches (mainly only when mighty patches are sold out) and there are none that even come close to these. If I have a big zit and put one of these on overnight, it will have already shrunk to half of its size if not more. Many times I have woken up and the zit is gone. I also love these because I can't stop touching when I have zits and these prevent the touching! GET THIS! They are absolutely the best/only pimple patch worth buying.

product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Comment: This lotion was AMAZINGGG. i’ve been trying to find a good vanilla lotion for a very long time and this one was perfect, came overnight, a good amount of thickness, feels good on your skin, smells HEAVENLY. i could smell it before i even pumped it. will be buying again. product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Title: It smells AMAZING  and makes your skin really soft
Review Comment: I think it's the best smelling lotion I've ever had all Mt friends keep begging me to use it it comes with a lot of lotion to and the bottle is big. There is nothing bad about it it helps with ashy knees and elbows. Great value for what your getting. The bottle is cute and easy to take on vacation . It works amazingly and lasts long!♡

product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Comment: I have psoriasis and for the first time have a horrid flare up and I am particularly concerned about lotions I use. For one, my dry skin usually just absorbs lotions and it's as if I've not applied any within minutes of using it. It's a waste and some worsen my scaly areas. It's a struggle finding a good thick lotion that works for dry skin while smelling good. If I find that combo, it costs an arm and a leg. But the EOS lotion has been a miracle! I've began with the peach and love the scent. It's not too strong but I love a sweet fragrance and this is super feminine smelling without being too strong. The absorption is the best I've had for a reasonably priced lotion that smells this good ever. It doesn't require much because it's thick like a body butter and it goes a long way. It dries fast without leaving you greasy. I apply it after my bath or shower and through out the day as I wash my hands bc it's so easy to use since it absorbs quickly. The pump is good quality as well and works good. Some don't. Especially with a thick product like this. The lotion consistency is thick and rich and lightweight. But due to its thickness, I recommend once you've ran low and cannot pump any more out, cut the top off the container or cut the container in two and you'll find a fairly large amount still sticking to the sides of the bottle. I got about another weeks worth out of it while I waited for my new order. I accidentally got the warm and cozy scent this time bc it's in a pink bottle like the peach and it smells so good, too! But I think I prefer the peach. Try them all! I'm going to eventually. This product works on my psoriasis and patches and I don't itch anymore since using it. I love this and hope they keep it as it is at this affordable price!

product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Title: Keeps my skin moisturized and has a pleasant smell.
Review Comment: The EOS Shea Butter Jasmine Lotion is a great choice for moisturizing. It absorbs quickly, leaving the skin soft without feeling greasy. The jasmine scent is light and pleasant, though it might be a bit strong for those sensitive to fragrances. Overall, it’s a lotion I’ll keep buying and it’s an effective lotion for daily use as I have a sensitive skin.

product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Comment:
EOS Vanilla Cashmere Lotion is an absolute treat for the senses! From the moment you apply it, the creamy, rich texture feels incredibly soothing on the skin, providing instant hydration without being greasy. The formula absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and nourished—perfect for dry or sensitive skin.

The scent of Vanilla Cashmere is simply divine. It has a warm, comforting fragrance with the perfect balance of sweet vanilla and soft, cozy cashmere notes. It’s not overpowering, but rather subtle and long-lasting, creating a gentle scent that lingers on your skin throughout the day. It's perfect for those who love sweet, cozy fragrances that are both calming and sophisticated.

What I love most about this lotion is how well it moisturizes. The blend of shea butter, aloe, and other natural ingredients leaves skin feeling deeply hydrated and pampered, without the sticky or heavy feeling that some lotions can leave behind. It’s ideal for daily use, whether you’re applying it in the morning or after a shower.

product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Title: Not a Strawberry Dream —> Ranking All Scents
Review Comment:
ANOTHER UPDATE ~ These lotions really got me going through it. After trying all scents I have a solid ranking that can help others.
1. Fresh & Cozy
2. Strawberry Dream (Fresh & Cozy and Strawberry Dream are interchangeable but Fresh & Cozy seems more universal and versatile)
3. Coconut Waters (Coconut Waters was 4th before because Pink Champagne is more exotic smelling and I’m trying to give a more universal rating but it’s definitely more my personality so I had to switch it.)
4. Pink Champagne
5. Vanilla Cashmere
6. Jasmine Peach
7. Pomegranate Raspberry

eos Shea Better Fresh & Cozy Moisture Body Lotion
Morning light, dewy cassis and sheer musk
The fragrance of “Fresh & Cozy” is so simple yet anything but underwhelming. When you focus on the scent, it, to me, is the epitome of comfort. I highly appreciate it. This is the best out of the ones I’ve tried for the versatility. It’s not the loudest scent out of the line. It’s also not prettiest or overtly feminine scent in the world. But it’s the prettiest universal “clean”/low key scent I’ve ever smelled. It’s like pretty linens not just linens and that is obviously attributed to the cassis. I don’t have anything as refreshing yet feminine as this. Makes no sense how comforting it smells.

eos Shea Better Strawberry Dream Moisture Body Lotion
sparkling strawberry, pink sugar, and vanilla cream
I initially was disappointed by this scent because the strawberry note is not as strong as I was expecting and it doesn’t last on the skin but this is the best scent for my body chemistry and i really like the slightly creamy pink sugar smell that remains for hours, even until the next day, on my skin! It makes me feel really cute yet it’s not immature to me! It is BY FAR the longest lasting fragrance out of the ENTIRE line on me and It’s actually my favorite now after prolonged use. I get it now I was just impatient. I wanted to make it #1 but everyone’s taste is different.

eos Shea Better Pink Champagne Moisture Body Lotion
pear champagne, ruby pomegranate & plum suede
juicy, different. pretty. feminine. I had my mom put it on and it reaffirmed my opinion of it. the sillage and projection is much stronger on her. Smells very good and exotic. I haven’t always been into scented lotions so the notes in this are very intriguing to me. It’s just so good! It’s notes are loud and distinct on my skin yet the overall exotic scent doesn’t last as long on me. this definitely can be in 3rd place. but it’s not as versatile for my personality. It’s VERY pretty and unique. It doesn’t stand out on my skin as distinctly or as long as Strawberry Dream. It actually leaves my skin in an hour and what remains is a sheer pear/plum musky smell for an additional hour. Interesting. I don’t like categorizing scents by seasons but it definitely gives off summer vibes. I’m a Autumn/Winter girl.

eos Shea Better Coconut Waters Moisture Body Lotion
creamy coconut, lush hibiscus and solar musk
I am most surprised by this lotion as I tried to stay away from coconut scented products because they always smell like piña colada. I don’t want anything tropical. Like I mentioned before I love milky and creamy scents and I was hoping it would smell like coconut milk and for now this is as close as I’ll get. it is more creamy and musky than tropical and it’s overall really pretty. I like it more than Pink Champagne and wear it more. So creamy! The hibiscus in this definitely helps it. I find this to be more interesting than the vanilla cashmere as that one to me just smells like caramel. I also put a baby oil on top of this and i’m telling you it smells so creamy and yummy.

eos Shea Better Vanilla Cashmere Moisture Body Lotion
whipped vanilla, soft musk and cozy caramel
I love vanilla, I love cream, I love milk scents. This isn’t bad but I can see how someone sensitive to scented products would smell burnt plastic instead of caramel. It’s more caramel than vanilla. Surprisingly my least favorite. A true vanilla lotion would be the one from The Lotion Company. That one is straight vanilla bean. The caramel isn’t cozy to me and is too sweet. A very gummy burnt (not in a bad way) caramel scent. I like smelling like a snack but it’s a bit too much for me. It actually gives me a headache. There’s nothing soft or cozy about this. I think I find this to smell a bit too juvenile for me. It’s clearly about personal taste. I know many adults who like this. I think teenager every time I smell it. Strawberry Dream has a creaminess mixed into so I can take it a bit more seriously i guess.

eos Shea Better Jasmine Peach Moisture Body Lotion
apricot nectar, sparkling jasmine, and vanilla sugar
I was looking for some thing similar to the Johnson baby lotion in the pink bottle but without the green leafy note. It’s a bit feminine, but not powdery and babyish. You get more jasmine than peach. It’s basically jasmine with a sour undertone. It’s, so far, the least impressive out of the bunch. it’s also a bit screechy/pissy on me sometimes. Fresh & Cozy is stronger and lasts longer than this. The smell goes so fast and it’s not even that noticeable so I’m returning. I keep going nose blind to it. When I do smell it I’m just sure you can find something stronger and less simple at bath and body works and i don’t even shop there. It’s just not that good and I personally like jasmine as a fragrance note in perfumes. My mother likes it. It smells like grandma to me and I usually like scents that lean more sensual and/or mature.

eos Shea Better Pomegranate Raspberry Moisture Body Lotion
luscious pomegranate blended with tart raspberries and lotus blossom
It’s not bad. It’s not for my personality. Unlike Jasmine Peach, you can smell this one easily. Not interested in tart scents but thought I’d try anyway. It reminds me of a scent of hand sanitizer I would’ve gotten from bath and body works. It’s an average lotion scent and it’s not bad. Not my choice. if Jasmine Peach Was better I would prefer it over this if I was forced to choose.

~ OLD Update: I raised it a star. I like strawberry dream but when it dries it’s just pink sugar. Not much cream. no strawberry. It’s cute. not that interesting but my nose welcomed the smell a bit more and i won’t return it. i’m not *AS* disappointed. ~

OLD REVIEW ~
It’s more sugar and cream and hardly any strawberry. I can’t believe I like Pink Champagne more than Strawberry Dream. It’s not bad but it smells like sugar cookies or biscuits. I was hoping for a strawberry cupcake vibe. There’s no strawberry once rubbed in. You only smell it right out of the bottle. For Pink Champagne I give it 4.5 stars because although I don’t usually like fruity smells, plum is not that common of a fragrance note for me to associate it with anything childish or juvenile. Plum and pear smell quite good. Lol i’m only 23 but i don’t like smelling like Skittles. I really don’t regret buying that one! Especially because I have others in my collection so it’s a good addition. Vanillas, milks, and cream scents are really nice and Strawberry Dream is a basic sugary scent that I’m unimpressed by. Disappointing. It doesn’t smell bad it’s just not as interesting or strong as the other lotions. Even Fresh and Cozy is more unique than this. Good thing is these lotions are the only lotions I feel that don’t leave my skin dry or absorb instantly. It leaves a bit of lubrication behind on the skin and not just a thin “dry” layer of oil. A nice silky finish on the skin. Comfortable and good value.

product_title: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea,
Review Title: the HONEST REVIEW you’re looking for
Review Comment: My package was delivered on time and honestly it is a really good lotion, however, the lotion itself felt rather warm but that’s probably because it’s like 90° outside; when I’d first used it, it reminded me of like yogurt kind of? It only reminded me of yogurt because I heard on tiktok that some people said that’s what the smell had reminded them of. Honestly, it did smell underwhelming at first, maybe it was just a bad batch, but after i had let the lotion cool in my freezer it smelled heavenly. I got used to the smell after a few hours and now I constantly keep smelling myself it’s addicting. Now, I won’t say it’s the best scent ever and it is kind of overhyped but if you’re looking for a lotion that is subtle yet smells flavorful you should totally get it. The lotion smells very rich, creamy, sweet, yummy, and overall very scrumdiliumtious; especially when you apply it. On the other hand, it does smell kind of bitter or sour like a yogurt or milk from time to time so based on first impressions I’d say I wouldn’t have liked it. Like if someone were to wear this and hug me i’d think they smelt a bit weird you know but overtime it starts to smell good in a way I don’t know how to explain it. If you see this review and you still want to try it I warn you that it may smell either bad or good; it depends on the person honestly. Personally, I love it like a lottt but i do think it could use a stronger enhanced vanilla scent; so I am going to add some essential oils and add it into my bodycare routine to smell so edible and yummy. I’d say the lotion pairs well with most body oils, mists, perfumes, etc that al compliment that vanilla rich creaminess with a sweet and delicious flavor. If you are planning on using it alone only I’d say to not get it unless you’d wanna be dissatisfied. For like $8-9 though I’d say it’s worth trying out and if you like it you like it, but if you don’t you don’t. Now for the size comparison I’d say it is quite big, personally i think it’s worth it so once I run out I will be buying another. Like the size of the lotion is bigger than my hand which says a lot because my hands are quite big. Now if you’re planning on using this to moisturize your body, I’d say it is okay but there is much better lotions out there but it is good to add into your routine if you wanna smell like vanilla. It does leave a nice smooth texture on my skin though and it lasts for a good amount of time; the scent does last indeed. Now for the thickness i’d say it isn’t that light but it isn’t heavy weighted either, honestly feels like the texture of yogurt which is honestly a coincidence considering some people say it does in fact smell like yogurt. Now for the value for money i’d say it is really worth it considering the fact that it is quite big and costs less; definitely get it if you’re looking for an affordable lotion. Anyways, that’s about all, I hope my review did help you I know I would have for sure liked to hear this from someone else before I’d gotten it! Overall, I’m rating it a 3.5/5 which is basically a 7/10!

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Comment:
I recently purchased the LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder, and it has quickly become one of my favorite makeup products! This powder delivers a beautiful, radiant finish while effectively evening out my skin tone.

The baked formula is lightweight and blends seamlessly into my skin, providing a soft-focus effect that makes my complexion look fresh and flawless. I love how it controls shine throughout the day without looking cakey or heavy. A little goes a long way, so it lasts quite a while!

I particularly appreciate the color-correcting aspect, as it helps to neutralize redness and brighten dull areas, leaving my skin looking vibrant. It works beautifully on its own or as a setting powder over foundation.

If you're searching for a high-quality powder that delivers on its promises, I highly recommend the Baked Balance-n-Brighten. It’s perfect for achieving a natural, polished look and has earned its place in my daily makeup routine!

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Title: WOW. JUST WOW. 4.5 out of 5; minus a little for no color/shade samples
Review Comment:
I'm almost 60/F, some wrinkles and a fair amount of discoloration, red spots, and sun damage, esp. on cheeks.

This foundation (baked balance and brighten, color FAIR) is really easy to use. Feels like nothing, even when building. I used only basic, soft, fluffy brushes I had on hand; they worked well for light coverage, but I do think a denser brush option -  like  a retracting kabuki, as recommended - might work better for building.

Very good coverage on bare skin (moisturizar only), pracrically perfect over an inexpensive primer. Almost all my flaws disappeared, even without concealer.

Did not settle in wrinkles, either. I FEEL PRET-TY, OH-SO PRET-TY!...or, at least, "not bad for an old broad, not at all!".

I do find that using primer is better over large pores and significant discoloration, such as have I. I used a budget brand with spf 30 and the foundation went on perfectly.

It's FAST, too. The longest part if the process is waiting for the primer to dry, maybe 1-3 minutes.

Found it difficult to shade match - but to be fair:  When is it *not* difficult?

Would be a very nice thing if Laura Geller Beauty offered an inexpensive "sampler" (say, $5.00 for just enough product for 1/2 face in two adjacent shades) to help in this process.

I tried "PORCELAIN"  first, but it was just a tad too light. The model wearing "FAIR" looks like an olive tone to me, whereas (I think?) I'm more peachy, like the "LIGHT" model - but I'm super pale...but ... but.. hem ..haw..

Seems really wasteful to open, use once and return a full product to try a color that isn't quite right, as I have. "Samplers" would really help reduce the volume of product  returns, not to mention reduce waste and carbon footprints - just sayin'.

Step up,😀Laura Geller. Make the planet as beautiful as you have me!

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Comment: Color is good. Very light and easy to apply. Coverage is light

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Comment:
I love this make up. I am 49, and like light weight cosmetics and an easy application routine. This stuff is AMAZING! And I don't say that lightly. The bright and balance is silky smooth, light weight and takes no ti.e to apply.
I put on my concern where I need it, blend it in and then apply my Brighten and Balance foundation with my kabuki brush. A little goes a long way and the coverage is amazing. Finish off with the Laura Geller blush, blend  and apply my mascara and I am ready for the day. It only takes me minutes to feel beautiful and I am out the door.
The make up lasts all day and my face feels silky smooth. The coverage is amazing too...
I love this product so much I have ordered a starter set for my mother for Christmas.

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Comment:
I waited until Prime Day to pick this up. I saw quite a few advertisements and based off of reviews decided to give it a try. I’m 50 with quite a few blemishes from sun, diet, and just regular aging. The idea of doing away with foundation was pretty enticing. I decided to try the product with 2 different layers to compare. 1. Medium coverageM (using full brush) and 2. Full coverageF (using the stiffer brush). I chose Medium based on skin color and previous purchases from other reviews.
1st pics, No make-up, 2nd pics half my face with full coverage with the next pic showing my regular make-up (foundation + powder) and same for medium coverage.
Final judgement:  Matching skin tone is really hard. I don’t think the medium color complements my skin very well. In fact, I felt like the full coverage side revealed more of my blemishes and had more of an orange tint no matter how I decided to go - Full coverage vs. Light to medium; my skin even looked like it had an orangish tint to it.
I’m sad because I do not think this is the product for me. It’ll be going back and I’ll continue on with my mission to find the perfect minimalist make-up.

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Comment: I guessed at color of skin for coverage. It blended well with my complexion. It isn’t as brightening as I had hoped, but I am a senior of 78. It doesn’t leave a demarcation line at jaw like many powders do. I am surprised that it feels light but does look nice on. When powder was shown on line, there was a trace of pink, not so with mine. I bought FAIR. Porcelain would be lighter than I am. I was hoping this product would be a total answer to face but I need peachy blush I guess. Pink would be contrived looking for my age. I will buy it again.

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Title: Exactly what I’ve been looking for…
Review Comment: Coverage was good, felt good on my skin. Easy to apply-I recommend to prep your skin well including primer. Wears well; for all, ALL day or on into the evening, a touch up is helpful. Porcelain was too light but Fair alone a little too orange. I use Porcelain as a base and light dusting (forehead, cheeks and nose, and chin) of the Fair to pick up the color a little. I have struggled for many years getting a foundation that looks and feels right. I have dry, mature skin, some rosacea and hyper-pigmentation. Doesn’t dry out my skin and doesn’t feel dry on my skin. Doesn’t cake up or settle around my eyes. For once I feel really happy with my makeup routine and look. Feel I could be a fan for life!

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Comment:
I'm 44 years old and losing the battle on aging lol. I saw the commercials for this and thought I would try it. I want to address all three items in my heading since I have all that at the same time. My skin regiment includes a lot of anti wrinkle creams, retinol, and moisturizers, hence the acne I keep getting. I have gained and lost weight multiple times in my life so the wrinkles and textured skin followed.

First off this is too light to cover acne. I recommend a concealer first. I tried layering multiple times just to see if I could get the coverage I wanted. By the time the acne was hidden I looked awful lol. The powder caked way too much after all the layers.

Textured skin and wrinkles: moisturizer and foundation primer are a must! This powder is not the best for putting it right on textured skin especially if you want a little extra powder on some spots. It almost enhanced the textured skin I have on my chin. The foundation primer worked well for this and the wrinkles. You still can't put too much powder on or it will enhance what you are trying to minimize.

On the positive side I think the color I chose worked well and the powder is very light and feels nice on my skin. It does add a little luminescent to your complexion. I did go to the Laura Geller website to chose a color first. I bought this from Amazon due to the sale price and Prime shipping. It was not cracked or broken, and it was well packaged in bubble wrap. I picked a cute little retractable Kabuki brush by EcoTools on Amazon also and I love it! Only $8 too!

Overall I probably won't be buying this again. I was trying to find something that would shorten up my makeup regimen so I could skip the foundation. The commercials are very convincing but she has almost flawless skin to begin with. On my best days I could probably use this but I gave up on it about 2 months after buying it.

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M
Review Title: Great if you have oily skin
Review Comment: After seeing this product advertised on TV, I was curious.  I have oily skin and always wear a matte liquid makeup.  I always follow up with translucent powder.  I was pleasantly surprised with this Laura Geller product.  The coverage is really good and smooth and I do not have to use any translucent powder after applying.  The coverage lasts all day and oiliness of my skin is minimal as compared to a liquid foundation. The only drawback is that because it is a powder form, it is easy for it to create some messiness when sweeping a foundation brush across it.  I lean over my sink so I don't make a mess on my counter.  It is a minimal cost when considering that I don't have to deal with mid-day oiliness.  It has lasted me nearly two months and I would say it is only a little more than half gone.  I would definitely purchase again.

product_title: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Award-Winning Baked Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Powder Foundation - Fair - Buildable Light to M

I have several brown spots on my face and it does not cover those up so I need to be looking for some kind of concealer that I guess and then put the base on. I put blush over that I really like both of them. I like the kabuki brushes  to put them on my face. I feel pampered using this product.

product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No
Review Comment: I had low expectations for this product to work because curls from a curling iron fall out of my hair pretty immediately. I was blown away by how well these heatless curls turned out, though! It’s easy enough to do, but there’s a bit of a learning curve to getting the curls tightly wrapped. product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No
Review Comment: My hair has gone from never being able to hold a curl in my 31 years of life, to being curled all day. I  purchased this to try and learn the heatless curling technique. I really Wanted to get a high end curler made from silk, but didn’t want to spend the money until I learned The technique and knew I would Be able to sleep through the night with it in. I  have Successfully used this every single night for about 2 months now. I’ve perfected a method that works best for my hair type. I have Long straight hair that is on the thinner side. After washing my hair, I will Blow dry it, lightly run a straightener over it to reduce frizz, then put this contraption on to my head and hair. Initially the crown method was my go to, but I’ve recently switched back to the original method where it’s on their side of your head like pigtails. I do Not use water. I do Put some hair oil on my lengths and a bit on the roots to reduce any frizz. I use The L’Oréal miracle oil. That stuff truly IS a miracle. I also sometimes will spray a bit of hairspray over it once it’s in my hair. I do Sleep with a satin bonnet nightly which I’m sure also helps the style to form. Once you get what works for you down, this thing works great! I dont Wash my hair daily, about every 3 days, and second and third day hair come out just as good using this. Recommend giving it a try

product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No
Review Title: Affordable and less damaging to your hair
Review Comment:
The Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set is designed for those seeking a heat-free method to achieve curls overnight. Here’s an overview of its features, benefits, and potential drawbacks based on user feedback:

Features:

 • Heatless Curling: The primary benefit is its ability to curl your hair without damaging it with heat tools. It is made to be used while you sleep, saving time and minimizing heat exposure.
 • Satin Material: The satin fabric is gentle on the hair, reducing friction and frizz, which is especially useful for preventing breakage and maintaining smooth curls.
 • Includes Curling Rod & Scrunchies: The set typically comes with a long satin rod and matching satin scrunchies to secure the ends of your hair after wrapping them around the rod.
 • Comfort: Designed to be worn overnight, the satin material is soft against the scalp and comfortable while sleeping.

Benefits:

 • Prevents Heat Damage: Since it is heatless, it protects hair from the typical damage caused by heated styling tools like curling irons or straighteners.
 • Convenient: You can achieve curls overnight with minimal effort, making it ideal for busy mornings.
 • Frizz Control: The satin helps reduce frizz, leading to smoother, shinier curls.
 • Reusable: Eco-friendly since it’s a one-time purchase you can reuse as often as needed.

Drawbacks:

 • Results May Vary: Different hair textures and lengths may see varied results. Those with thicker hair may need more product or practice to get consistent curls.
 • Learning Curve: Some users report that it takes time to master the technique to ensure even curls without tangling or awkward positioning.
 • Sleeping Comfort: While soft, it may still take getting used to sleeping with the rod in place, and some users may find it slightly uncomfortable.

Overall Verdict:

The Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set is an affordable, gentle way to achieve curls without heat damage. It works particularly well for those with fine to medium hair, though it may require some trial and error to perfect the technique. It’s a solid option if you’re looking to maintain hair health while styling overnight.

product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No
Review Comment: So I got this as I usually wear my hair naturally curly and prefer to keep as much heat off as possible however with the change of weather I'm forced to curl my hair.  It took me 2 tries to figure out how tight to wrap my hair before getting the exact curls I would usually get with a curling iron.  You do not feel this while sleeping.  I travel a lot for work so I typically wash and curl my hair day one, because of this I can leave my curling iron home and not only keep the heat off but...takes no room in my luggage.

product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No

product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No
Review Title: OMG. MY STRAIGHT HAIR HAS CURLS!  I NEEDED 2.
Review Comment: I’m 66 yrs old & have always had a hard time curling my hair.  It either doesn’t curl, the curls fall out, or it simply takes too long to curl it when I need to be somewhere.  I have a lot of hair & it’s long.  I tried curling it w/ one of these.  The front was fairly curly but the back was just ok.  So I bought another & now my hair looks evenly curled.  I put Kenra styling gel 17 in my wet hair & blow dry just my roots on a lg round brush where my part’s going to be.  I leave my hair damp & make a zig zag part down the center back.  My hair had a noticeable part at the top when dry when I made a straight part down the back.  Making a zig zag part before curling it gave me a better result.  It doesn’t have to be a perfect zig zag.  I use clips to keep the sections separate.  Then I separate the sides at the front of my ears.  I again use clips to keep the sections separate.  Then I put a Kitsch on top towards the back of my hair & start wrapping.  I run a comb through occasionally to keep my hair smooth & lightly spray the ends w/ water if they get dry before I finish wrapping them.  Once all my hair is wrapped, I will put a diffuser on my blow dryer & dry the root area just because my hair is so thick.  It sounds like a lot.  But I had it down the 2nd time I curled my hair.  These are incredible!  I sleep on my back.  So I don’t find them to be uncomfortable at all, even w/ 2 in my hair.  In the morning , I fluff my hair & use a light hairspray.  It takes 2 minutes to do my hair & there’s no risk of burning myself.  My curls loosen a bit; but, last for days.  I have tried every hot tool on the market & never had the success these give me.  Watch several YouTube videos before trying it yourself.

product_title: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Heatless Hair Curlers to Sleep in - Heatless Curls Overnight - Heatless Curling Rod - No
Review Title: So easy for beginners, Where has this been all my life??

I made it a small mission of mine to become more in touch with my femininity and this tool really brought out my curls!! I only used once and the tutorials I watched on youtube were incredibly helpful - even for a beginner!

All I did was take a shower, waited a while for most of my hair to dry, and then I started wrapping! When I was done, I made sure to squirt some water on both sides to really set those curls in. I slept with them in and to be honest, I forgot they were there  (I'm a side sleeper so that should tell you something) .

I have always wanted to curl my hair but didn't love the maintenance that goes into it. This makes it much easier! Thank you Kitsch for making me feel beautiful :)

Review Title: Great for people who aren't good about a skin care routine.
Review Comment:
I’ve always struggled to stick to a proper skincare routine, especially when it comes to removing my makeup. Sometimes, I just want something easy and quick, and these **Neutrogena Ultra-Soft Makeup Remover Wipes** have been a total lifesaver.

First off, they work *really* well. I wear waterproof mascara, and usually, it takes a lot of scrubbing to get that stuff off, but these wipes just melt it away without me having to tug at my skin. And they're super gentle around the eyes, which is huge since that area is so sensitive. I didn’t have any irritation, which can happen with other products, especially when I’m tired and don’t want to deal with anything harsh.

What I love most is how **moisturized** my skin feels after using them. I don’t feel like my face is tight or stripped of moisture like with other makeup removers. There's no greasy residue, but my skin feels soft, smooth, and refreshed. I’ve also noticed that I don’t need to rinse my face afterward, which is a total time-saver, especially at night when I just want to crash into bed.

Honestly, these wipes are perfect for people who don’t have a solid skincare routine (like me!) or anyone looking for a fast and easy way to take off makeup without all the extra steps. I can’t say enough about how convenient they are—grab a wipe, swipe away the day’s makeup, and you're done. No fuss, no mess.

product_title: Tree Hut Vanilla Shea Sugar Exfoliating & Hydrating Body Scrub, 18 oz

Review Comment: absolutely love the product the smell is fabulous while you're in the shower after that there's nothing which is surprising because I have the watermelon and I have the pineapple and both of those you walk out of the bathroom and you can smell it in the next room that's how potent they are granted they don't stay on your skin very long but as far as using them as a scrub they're fabulous I mean your skin feels fabulous afterwards and smooth and it doesn't prevent you from having to use moisturizer you still do I do like the fact that they're not oil-based so it's gentler on your shower system and turn your drainage etc for having oils go down there to clog it up you could possibly add your own oil to it if you wanted to maybe move it up a little bit out a little argan oil to it a couple drops and mix it in there I'm sure it would work but it's fine just as it is and so far as I said the peach is the only one that I adore peach it smells great in the shower it just there's no fragrance afterwards whatsoever so that's disappointing I also have the vanilla which I have not yet used so we'll see how that is but the watermelon so far by far and the pineapple are both fantastic I mean the watermelon is absolutely incredible so you don't smell like watermelon afterwards I mean your your house smells over for a little while but but you don't and it definitely a value for the money because it's really unsubscribe and save I mean these little jars last well over a month using them every other day so you're getting at least 15 probably to 20 uses out of each jar so I would say it easily would last a month and that's using a lot so you could cut it back and you could probably get a full month out of each jar easily

Review Title: Great product but not what I was expecting…
Review Comment: I honestly thought this was a body wash of some sort, some kind of scrub, but what it really is and the only way to describe it is that I used to work for a company We would have to change the oil and do a lot of car related things where your hands and your face would get dirty and regular soap would not get the dirt off. They had at the car place and I don’t remember the name of it some kind of soap that was Almost like a hard powder. But when you wash your face and hands with it, all that dirt came right off. That Is basically what this is. Again, I thought it was something else, but I gave it five stars because if I’m doing projects and I get that kind of dirt on me rather than wash my hands 15 times I can wash my hands with this and they come clean and they smell great. So my honest review would be this was not the reason why I bought it Initially, But it ended up being useful in a completely different way and I’m very happy with that. So for the reason that I gave, I would recommend it. If you’re looking for a body wash, I would not recommend it

product_title: Tree Hut Vanilla Shea Sugar Exfoliating & Hydrating Body Scrub, 18 oz

product_title: Tree Hut Vanilla Shea Sugar Exfoliating & Hydrating Body Scrub, 18 oz
Review Comment:
I have never used a sugar scrub before. I bought this product to give one a try.

Pros

Does the job as advertised. The sugar grit makes my skin feel clean and fresh. There is a lot of product for the price, it is a pretty color, and it doesn't irritate my skin. It arrived quickly, didn't leak or crack open during shipping, and was one of a wide variety of scents and colors on offer.

Cons

Smells like a Yankee Candle farted, and unless the shower is rinsed off very well, makes that smell as well. This is especially irksome when real old-school farting occurs in the near vicinity, as happens in bathrooms. The resulting combination provides for a truly unique olfactory experience.

TL;DR Product does the job, but I personally do not care for the scent.

product_title: Tree Hut Vanilla Shea Sugar Exfoliating & Hydrating Body Scrub, 18 oz

I think I’ll stick to buying tree hut products in person

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Title: Glides on smooth and easy to handle!
Review Comment: This eyeshadow stick is worth the hype and the price tag: on one end is a smooth applicator tip that is wide enough to brush on without too much effort; the other side is a smudge sponge for a quick blend. It is perfect for everyday prep at home or as a travel eyeshadow for on-the-go beauty. The color was a subtle brown shimmer with a touch of mauve -- a good neutral eyeshadow. It lasted most of the day without needing a touch-up. Highly recommend to anyone new to eye makeup or those on a more professional level who love a good soft long-lasting easy-to-use eyeshadow.

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Title: Beautiful and easy to use formula, perfect eyeshadow for travel
Review Comment:
Pros:

Super easy to use. The eyeshadow literally glides on very easily with zero drag. Immediate color payoff and for shades that really show up on your skin, you need just one swipe.  This part is definitely way better than the cheaper options (I've tried one other brand which was a fourth of the cost but is rough on my lids and requires a lot of back and forth to give me the same color payoff).

They last long. I have not seen any issues with color fading through the day with these.

Perfect for travel. I love throwing a couple of shades in my make up pouch without having to worry about packing a palette (and worrying about it opening and spilling all over) or brushes.

Cons:

As with any other make up product of course, some colors just don't match the payoff you see in advertised photos. Which wouldn't be as much of a problem if these weren't $15+ per eyeshadow.
I have four colors - the Smoky Tawny Matte and Ochre Matte barely show up on my lids. Although the advertised photos show color pay off on darker lids, I personally find it much lighter than the photos on mine (I have the typical south asian dark lids). Orchid shimmer and Sheer blush pink look amazing on my lids. Looks like the shimmer shades definitely help add some dimension to any base colored lids.

Personally the pros outweigh the cons for me and I love this product! I'll still use the shades that didn't give a lot of payoff for everyday looks. I use very few colors on my eyes so I'd much rather save money and buy more of these eyeshadow sticks than expensive palettes where I'll use maybe 2 out of 10-15 colors.

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Comment: This product was an absolute game changer! I’m not the most talented when it comes to make up but this made it so much easier! It’s was a beautiful color as well with a little bit of shimmer! It wasn’t sticky, nor did it have a weird texture. And it stayed on so well for my photoshoot in August!

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Comment:
I have older skin and some shadows are hard to put on because it pulls the skin and then leaves a line with no product on it.  I love this stuff!  I purchased the color that I did, Flame Shimmer, to help me figure out what colors I was really looking for and when it came in, I was not surprised by the color but felt it would probably look too orange/gold on me but it turns out that I like it color quite well.  I have just ordered two more in different colors!
1.  Great application, even on older skin
2.  About as true color as you can get on a computer monitor
3.  The product feels great, just glides right on and then is easy to smudge if you prefer.
I did not test its waterproof or long-wearing abilities as those are not important to me.

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Title: Received a used item! Color had unexpected glitter in it.
Review Comment:
I didn't get to try this out because I received a used item. (And it appears I'm not the only one.) I was able to get a close look at it, and I was immediately disappointed with the color "mixture." The item I selected wouldn't have worked for me, regardless of any other issue.

I've been curious about these eyeshadow sticks for a long time. I wanted to test them out years ago, but they seemed kind of pricey for my budget. I don't like to spend more than I'm used to on an item I have no certainty will work as claimed. But then my friend told me she bought a stick on discount, and it was a game changer for her. (Easy to use, easy to blend, buildable color, quick application, lasts long, looks natural, etc.) She said she bought more and suggested I at least try one. She insisted they were worth the regular price... finding one on discount was just a bonus. We're very much alike in what we look for in beauty cosmetics, so I was intrigued. I also saw there were a ton more reviews on Amazon than the last time I checked, and the majority of them seemed highly positive. So, I went for it. I felt I had the amount of guarantee I needed to justify testing this thing out.

I got the sheer shimmery pink color to use as a highlighter and on the inner corner of my eyes for a brightening effect. But that's not going to happen now. After I received my used product, I took a closer look at the reviews on Amazon - mostly to see if anyone mentioned unexpected problems with the same color I ordered. Instead, I noticed there were quite a bit of people who received what appeared to be used products, too!

This is highly disappointing considering this brand seemed to have made a good name for itself over the last few years. I was really excited to finally try their infamously convenient and water-resistant eyeshadow stick. You'd think they'd be more careful about the products they're sending out - especially for what they're charging.

My eyeshadow stick was undoubtedly used before I received it. Box was slightly crushed with signs of having been opened. The tip of the eyeshadow was smudged and there was product smeared on the outside of the barrel. If all that wasn't proof enough, the sponge tip had makeup residue on it as if someone fully tried every part of this thing out.

I can't speak for the application and wear quality of the item because I'm not willing to risk transferring potential bacteria to my eyes, face, or even the back of my hand. I can say the expectation of the product was not met, right off the bat. I can also add that I was surprised that there looked to be big chunks of glitter in the shimmery sheer pink eyeshadow and on the sponge tip. (I wasn't expecting such large specks of actual GLITTER to be in the mix. It wasn't shown on the advertised photos or explicitly stated that cheap glitter would be used. I did expect some fine mineral-like shimmer, but not cheap glitter.)

I'd suggest that if you buy this product, you thoroughly inspect it upon receiving it. Having cosmetics melt or break during shipment is one thing. But being sold a used product (advertised as new) is absolutely unacceptable. Especially,  when there's evidence of it be a reoccurring issue for this particular product.

I'm debating whether or not I want to try ordering another color - only because my friend was raving about this eyeshadow like it was the best product she has found to date. If I do decide to take another chance, I'd likely play it safe and choose a matte shade. I can handle some amount of "shimmer," but I feel I'm a bit too old and I don't get dressed up enough to decorate my eyes with glitter. (I cannot stress enough: This was straight up large specks of GLITTER - almost like you'd find in a craft store or in young teens' cheap & trendy makeup - mixed in with an otherwise nice looking shimmery/pearlescent color.)

I'm just worried I'll get another used product... or that the product was otherwise kept in unsanitary/uncertain conditions before I received it. I just don't understand how this issue could happen so often. (Search thru the product reviews for yourself and count the number of complaints. You may not find it to be excessive, but I do. It really should be more of a rare occurrence. I haven't found this many complaints of used/questionable products when researching other cosmetics I'm also interested in trying.)

Also, avoid the shimmery sheer light pink color... unless you're ok with random large specks of glitter. Then maybe go for it. The overall main color appeared nice with some shimmer to it already.

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Comment:
I LOVE this eyeshadow! I chose the Champagne color. It goes on smooth and easy. My favorite eyeshadow was always Urban Decay's Sin (champagne shimmer), powder eyeshadow. This pen is less expensive and just gorgeous!

This item is not like other cream eyeshadows that crease or wipe off easily while wearing it. It also helps keep my liquid eyeliner on very well!
Another awesome feature, it almost acts as 2 colors in one. I use it in the corner of my eyes as a highlighter, looking slightly lighter than the lid. The pigment lasts ALL DAY and the product, itself, lasts a long time. I use it everyday. DEFINITELY my new go-to eyeshadow!

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Comment: I've bought four of these so far and I love them! So fast, so easy to use! You can choose just one, or mix and match depending on what you feel like.  Smoky Tawny Matte is my favorite, as it brings out my blue eyes against my fair skin while looking subtle.  HOWEVER, I traveled with it this last weekend and when I opened the tube, the color stick flew out from the case and was lost!  So, I'm giving four stars.  I'm purchasing a replacement, but I highly recommend that if you get one, take a moment to gently press the stick further into the case.  Each of my other 3 sticks went in almost a quarter of an inch before they were fully seated.  I'd rather loose a little to the case if it means that the whole color stick doesn't fall out.

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Comment:
First time trying cream eyeshadow. I have always used powder eyeshadow for my eye crease area and I wanted to try cream just to go for a more dewy look.

The packaging and the color is just perfect. I have dark on those black colored eyes and this brown is the perfect shade that makes my eyes stand out more. It’s like a chocolate brown. I looked at several brands and they were either too pricey or the brown was too light, so I went with this one based on the color and reviews. It is very creamy and glides on smoothly.

However, I tried the sponge like applicator that it comes with, and a eyeshadow brush that I use for blending. With both of these methods the eyeshadow looked very blotchy that I had to continue re-adding more to my eyes to even it out and still had to blend endlessly. I haven’t tried wetting the brush or the sponge which may help blending it out evenly. If wetting it doesn’t work, I may have to purchase a separate brush that is for cream eyeshadow.

product_title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème-to-Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick – Champagne Shimmer – Long-Lasting, Crease-Proof, Medium Golde
Review Comment: So I recently purchased 5 different colors at different times. One came broken but all others came in without an issue. Some reviewers stated that the eyeshadow caked or faded wearing for long hours but I did not have this problem. I wore the eyeshadow for over 8 hours and did not experience fading or creasing. I love how this product goes on smoothly and is easy to blend. I plan on purchasing additional colors.

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Comment: I got no. 68 the pink bottle. I've been looking for a scent like this after smelling it a while ago and not knowing what it was and finally found this. It's sweet, but not too sweet. Warm, inviting, mature, classy, and appropriate, yet sexy. My boyfriend is CRAZY about it. It's reminiscent of baccarat, but I didn't like baccarat, because it was too heavy/chemical smelling on me. This is perfect. I read other reviews and want to add, since other people mentioned it not having staying power, it has strong staying power, but like baccarat, one can become nose blind to it extremely quickly, I think just due to that chemical which is the main constituent of the scent. The scent will linger strongly on items it has been sprayed on unless you launder them. The dry down is heavenly. Very impressed, especially for a less expensive fragrance. Very, very nice. 2 sprays is perfect, don't use more.

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Comment: I’m so in love with this brand and the scent. The lotion is the softest. I literally fell in love with the scent of the lotion. It makes me feel so beautiful that I had to get the spray. It is a great quality, each spray is full of fragrance!  is a great value for your money it will last me a really long time.  It’s very effective because it smells so good. The sun lingers a long time makes me just feel clean and beautiful.

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Comment: I hadn't tried this scent before but It might be one of my new favorites. It lasts a while but I had to reapply after a bit. It's light weight and a great size, fit right in your bag:)  There has been No leaking, it's well made and the cap snaps on very well. Loving this brand and this is the second scent I've tried!

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Title: If you like warm, vanilla based bakery smells, THIS is your scent!
Review Comment: Holy moly! I was expecting something nice going by the reviews, but this is a great fragrance! I just got a body/hair mist in the mail yesterday, it was so faint, I could hardly smell it. But this one? I gave one spray on my wrist, brought it up to my nose and was stunned at the sweet, caramelly, warm, toasty, vanilla wonderland! I can only wear food scented items, I get headaches from regular perfumes! So I tend towards Vanilla, coconut, mango…stuff like that, and have for decades. Let me tell you that, having tried dozens and dozens of vanilla perfumes/sprays, this is the richest, most indulgent and FRAGRANT spray I have ever used! It’s layered and it’s delicious! My boyfriend took one sniff and tried to bite my arm (jokingly), said I smelled like amazing cookies! It’s one of the loveliest vanilla based scents I have ever smelled, it’s hours later, I can still smell it. You will only need a little spray to have people following you to find out why you smell so good! BUY IT! I’m getting the one that smells like their Brazilian Bum-Bum cream next!

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Comment:
The smell is exactly what was advertised.  In fact, I forgot what scent i got and when I tried it, all I thought of was a macadamia nut cookie. To my surprise, that's almost exactly what the brand claimed to emulate!
The scent is really warm, pleasant, and potent. It is a mist, so the scent doesn't last long; however, I didnt expect the scent to have faded almost completely in 30 minutes (on plain, clean skin). One the bright side, it is affordable, so light reapplication on the hot spots every couple hours would be a nice addition to a layered scent profile.
Finally, the packaging is really nice for the price of the product. The bottle is a hard plastic, but still feels quality. The biggest plus for me is the spray straw that reaches all the way to the bottom of the container so you can enjoy every last drop. Details matter and this passed.
I'm excited to try all their other scents

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Comment: Just got it. Sprayed it on once and already in love with it ! My family smelt it right away and also loved it. Smells strong, but in a good way, like it will last long. So don't have to spray to much . 10/10

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist Travel Size 90mL/3.0 fl oz.
Review Comment:
