product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Title: OMG, if you have oily skin, you NEED this!
Review Comment:
I had been hearing so many good things about this company's products, that I had to try some. So, I bought "The 6 Peptide Booster" serum a couple of weeks ago, and I liked how fast I was seeing results. Then, a coworker told me about their moisturizer, and I just HAD to try it (along with their retinol cream and peptide eye cream). I could literally create an entire skin care routine using ONLY their products, because EVERYTHING I've tried, I have loved.

This particular product is just MADE for us oily/combination skin types! One thing I've heard folks with oily skin admit to is not using a moisturizer at all. I mean...it's your call, obviously, but if you're using any actives, you should definitely be moisturizing...unless you WANT wrinkles - again, your call! Dryness causes aging, which is why we oily skin types age slower than those with dry skin. When you use a retinoid or retinol or ANY actives to take care of acne, etc, you are speeding up the cell turnover rate, and you need those cells to slough off. If those cells are dry, they're going to stick and make you dryer, while holding the dry shape - the shape of wrinkles.

This moisturizer is PERFECT for anyone who is oily, because it itself is NOT oily. It soaks right in and leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. I'm not sure how repairing it is just yet, but I'm currently using their retinol cream, and for the first time in...ever, I don't feel like my skin is on fire when I apply a moisturizer under my eyes. That could be their moisturizer or the gentleness of the retinol, or both. There's also ZERO smell, which is great for sensitive skin!

I HIGHLY recommend this product. I now have to buy another one for my 19-year-old daughter, because she saw me using it, wanted to try it, and she loved it too. The BEST part is that it's affordable enough to buy more! Which I may also have to do, because my 4-year-old son has eczema, and I am giving serious thought to trying it on him for the repairing factors and the fact that there aren't any concerning ingredients.

If you're on the fence, I'd say try it. I don't think you'll be disappointed!

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Comment:
I like how soft and smooth and yes slimy it is but it doesn't feel slimy icky. The feel is like egg whites but dries soft and fully absorbed in the skin. A little goes a long way. I bought in July and am still on the same container. And that's after some spilled while traveling internationally. It should last to Dec and may have lasted to January if I was more careful. I also reapply after every face wash/rinse and that's 4 to 5x a day so I can pray. So maybe it could have lasted even twice the amount it's lasted so far...
I highly recommend the product and plan to try out the whole line. Their serum is even stand alone. I also bought that. I don't do makeup so I can't speak to it's makeup relationship but my early middle age skin enjoys the moistureizing cool softness of this.

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Comment:
can't say enough good things about the COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Repair Cream! This product has been a game changer for my skincare routine. The texture is wonderfully lightweight yet incredibly moisturizing, making it perfect for my dry and acne-prone skin. After incorporating this cream into my daily routine, I noticed an immediate improvement in my skin’s overall hydration and texture. It leaves my skin feeling soft and plump without feeling greasy.

What I love most is how it helps to soothe redness and irritation while promoting healing from breakouts. I've seen a significant reduction in my acne scars, and my skin looks brighter and more radiant. Plus, it layers beautifully under makeup and other skincare products.

If you’re looking for a reliable, effective moisturizer that delivers on its promises, I highly recommend trying COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Repair Cream. It's become a holy grail product for me, and I can’t ever imagine being without it!"

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Title: Very moisturizing but not enough for dry winter skin
Review Comment: I have a normal skin type, so this moisturizer is perfect for me during the warmer months. It has a very smooth texture and it works very well. However, it doesn't give my skin enough moisturization during the fall and winter now that my skin is dryer. About 3 hours after I do my morning skincare, my skin is somewhere in between dry and moisturized. I would not recommend this product for those who have dry skin at any point during the year unless you want to apply multiple layers throughout the day. Again, great moisturizer but only for spring and summer.

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Comment: I've been using this product for about a month or two, it's wonderful! I'm 55, have some lines, my complexion was starting to get a little dry and dull looking. After using this just a few times I noticed something was "different". I just put my finger on what it is a few days ago. My complexion looks much more even, my pores look smaller (I've never had large pores until a few here and there seem to have popped up as I've gotten older), and my skin just looks "younger". It's also softer too. It is a tad sticky, and I do mix it with another moisturizer, my skin is pretty dry most of the time. When it dries, my face feel nice and smooth, my makeup goes on much better. A little goes a long way, so this jar is lasting very nicely. My skin can get irritated by some products, I have not had any irritation from this at all. Everyone's skin is different, but mine seems to really like this! I recommend!

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Title: A PLUS for sensitive skin (older women especially)
Review Comment:
I am pleasantly surprised by this product. I am 50 yrs young, going through perimenopause and my facial tone has seen better days.
Ok so We all know that stress. Environmental elements can affect your physical, mental, emotional health, especially aging women that don't take care of their older skin. You if don't take care of yourself.
I have tried pretty much every skin care regimen that a woman can possibly try. As stated above, I am 50 years old. I still have breakouts from time to time. I have broken red capillaries on my face. I have large poors. I have wrinkles.  Don't get me started on finding a great foundation. I haven't found that yet but anyways. I ordered this product and I was not for sure about what to expect just by the pure name of it. LOL but I ordered it along with a couple of the other skin care products from the same brand.  And I immediately washed my face and used my little shaver to exfoliate and get rid of the fuzzies and applied everything that I bought including this product and my face felt immediately 10 times better, it was almost kind of instant the redness went away.  The appearance of my pores was very minimal. My face looked shiny, kinda rejuvenated. It's not oily, it's really slick. It's very viscous, slimy consistency.  There is no smell, it's not grainy, it is whitish in color goes on clear rubs right in it takes a minute for it to dry on your face so it's kind of I wanna say tacky, but after it dries on your face, it feels really smooth and it's almost kinda like it tightens your face when it dries, so that was kind of a nice effect.  So when it dries on your face and it tightens like it did, I almost felt like it tightened the pores on my face. So that was a good indication that it was kind of smoothing out the appearance of the large pores that I have.
Overall, I would suggest buying this despite the weirdness of it.  It's good I have extremely sensitive skin. I have T zone area so I'm part dry part oily. I get a bit of psoriasis or eczema behind my ears or whatever and around my nose and my laugh lines are super sensitive to different products, especially Vitamin C products which I will never buy again.  But my face gets Super dry and flaky. And this product did not do that at all. No burn effect either. Exceeded my expectations overall. I'm very happy with my purchase and I will leave reviews for the other products that I bought from this brand on the other pages.

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Title: Lightweight Hydration, But Minimal Impact on Skin Repair
Review Comment:
The COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Repair Cream is a lightweight gel moisturizer formulated to hydrate and soothe sensitive, acne-prone, or dry skin with its high snail mucin concentration. It absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving a non-sticky finish that’s comfortable for daily use, even under makeup.

While the fast absorption is a plus, the cream didn’t seem to make a noticeable difference in terms of deep hydration or skin repair. Despite the promising snail mucin ingredient, which is known for its restorative properties, the effects were subtle at best, and it may not provide the rich moisture or transformative results expected for those with particularly dry or damaged skin.

This moisturizer might be a good option for those looking for a light, easy-to-layer gel for basic hydration, but for anyone seeking intensive repair or hydration, the COSRX Snail Mucin Repair Cream may not deliver the results desired.

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Title: Hydrating and Glowing Skin in One Step!
Review Comment: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer is a total game-changer for my skincare routine! This lightweight cream absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated without being greasy. After using it for a few weeks, my skin has a beautiful, healthy glow, and it feels more nourished than ever. I love how the snail mucin helps with skin repair and moisture retention. It’s become an essential part of my routine, and I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a Korean skincare product that truly delivers!

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean
Review Comment:
I have melasma, large pores, broken capillaries, combo skin (although with age it is getting more dry than oily) with some fine lines around my eyes, just turned 49, funny enough,  people say I look 10 to 15 years younger than my age despite my imperfections— I think it is in part due to this cream and genetics.

I have super duper sensitive skin that turns red when it’s hot, or if I go out in the sun or wash my face with warm water or very cool water, many years of retin- A usage is a contributing factor, but I digress.

I have been using this cream for 3 months and it has done wonders for my skin. My skin is dewy, plump, still has melasma but not as noticeable (50% lighter) , pores are smaller, hasn’t removed the fine lines but smoothed them to the point that I don’t really need pounds of other lotions or potions or make up to make me feel human or as I tell my kids, half human.

I found out that for me. I need to put three dime size to my entire face and neck ( I  even put it on the back of my hands) for it to really really work and it does require 20 minutes for it to fully absorb into your skin. I bought another jar of this stuff and I am think for me, this cream is enough to use to under eyes, face, neck and hands. Give it a go, see if you get the same results.

product_title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean

product_title: Medicube Collagen Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Facial Mask Pack - Elasticity & Hydration Care, Reduces Sagging & Dullness - Hy
Review Comment:
If you're looking for something to lock in moisture while you sleep, this mask does the job well. It seals in all the serums, ampoules, and moisturizers, giving your skin a good overnight treatment. But let’s be realistic—you're not going to wake up with "glass skin." That whole trend is overrated, and no product can deliver that flawless look. However, I did notice my skin looked healthier, more plump, and definitely hydrated in the morning.

There's no smell, which is a bonus, and it dries quickly. I also appreciate how it creates a barrier between my skin and my pillow, which helps keep dirt and bacteria away, reducing breakouts. Occasionally, I even use it as an acne patch, and it works surprisingly well.

Overall, yes, I’d recommend it if you're looking for something practical to improve your skin’s health, but keep your expectations realistic. You're not going to wake up looking airbrushed, but you’ll see gradual improvement with consistent use.

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Comment: This product is amazing!!! It is so smooth and goes on my skin so nicely. It has a nice smell and makes my skin feel so refreshed. It’s almost matte, but also hydrating. product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Title: Great sunscreen and daily moisturizer for sensitive skin.
Review Comment: Good value and thus far, has not caused any skin reactions. It doesn't take much. So, it will probably last quite a while. It appears to be a good sunscreen. I used this without makeup to hike and didn't burn. I've used it under makeup as well and it gives a really soft feel.

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Comment: I’ve been using L.A. Rosche- Posays 30 SPF Moisturizing Cream, and it’s been awesome! It keeps my skin hydrated and protected from the sun every day. I love how lightweight it feels; it doesn’t make my skin greasy at all. However, if I use it with some other products, I sometimes get dry and irritated. When that happens, I just take a break from it for a few days, and then I can start using it again without any issues. Overall, it’s a great moisturizer that works well, and I definitely recommend it for anyone needing sun protection and moisture! My dermatologist recommended it and you only need a small amount, coverage goes a long way.

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Title: My favorite face wash! Great for sensitive skin!
Review Comment: I’ve been using this face wash for the past year and it’s done my skin WONDERS !! 😫 My skin tends to be kinda dry but slightly oily in my t zone and around my nostrils. I’m also prone to breakouts, and anything scented tends to make things worse. I could never find a skincare routine that fully worked for me and made the breakouts stop. I was putting in SO MUCH WORK for little results, and then I started using this stuff and LET ME TELL YOU- MY SKIN HAS NEVER LOOKED/FELT SO GOOD !! At first, I noticed I was still dealing with some blemishes and almost stopped using this stuff cause I thought it was the face wash’s fault but it turns out it’s because I wasn’t using it properly (oops). Make sure to use a wash cloth when washing your face! I was uneducated and didn’t realize that by not using a wash cloth, I was leaving some of the face wash trapped on my skin and it was clogging my pores and causing the pimples. So make sure to AT LEAST use a clean wash cloth when rinsing it off, if not for the entire wash and rinse process. Also, this doesn’t just apply to this face wash, it’s apparently common skincare knowledge that I was just unaware of (like I said, it wasn’t the face wash’s fault y’all)! I now am happy to say that I haven’t had a breakout or uneven skin in many months. I make sure to use it twice a day, morning and night, and for me personally I apply Paula’s choice pore reducing toner with a cotton pad afterwards (use toner while your skin is still wet!) and then usually vitamin c serum, a couple drops of jojoba oil, and some spf on top during the day. I dab off any extra oiliness with a paper towel (don’t rub the paper towel on your face it’s not good for your poor sensitive skin 😭) At night I wash my face, use the toner, and then some jojoba oil, rosehip seed oil, or The Ordinary’s 1% retinol in squalane depending on what I feel my skin needs (also if you wanna start using a retinol serum, I highly recommend doing some research first so you know what you’re getting into/how often to use it!) overall, this stuff feels great on my face and isn’t too thick and it doesn’t leave any weird residue feeling like some face washes have in the past. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and balanced, no more dry or oily spots! I also love that the bottle is easy to take with me places because I travel a lot. It has a cool little c shaped clip that goes under the pump to keep it from leaking in your bag which is an honest lifesaver. The bottle is durable too/it’s not about to get crushed in my bag under all my stuff. Overall, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this face wash for anyone with sensitive skin!!

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Title: My all time favorite face cream!
Review Comment: My sister suggested I try this face cream. I love it and it is the best face cream I’ve tried. It goes on smooth and feels so good on my skin. It holds the moisture and keeps my skin feeling subtle and refreshed.

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Title: Great face moisturizer thats not too heavy
Review Comment: This is a staple in my daily skin routine! Very light and a little goes a long way. does not leave my skin feeling oily and absorbs through the skin.

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Title: LOVE IT!! lightweight, lovely moisturizer w/ spf and skin loving ingredients LOVE IT!!!!
Review Comment:
LOVE LOVE LOVE this. It will be a repurchase.

It is creamy, smooth, lightweight. It does not feel like an SPF product. It is so light and airy feeling.

My skin: mid 40s, clear, NON acne Rosacea (just visible veins, some flushing), normal to dry skin, semi sensitive--though less so since incorporating skin barrier building and protecting ingredients (hence my love of La Roche Posay products).

Yes, I love La Roche-Posay products. Seems there is something for everyone. I recommend checking out all they have to offer, and WHY. Such good ingredients. I have used their Toleraine creamy face cleanser, cicaplast baume, hydrating mask, assortment of sunscreens, and most recently this Toleraine Double Repair Face Moisturizer with SPF 30.

I tend to have a pretty solid skin care routine for night. For day time, it is pretty much whatever I feel like using, with emphasis on SPF. Most of the year I can do a combo of various morning products plus my SPF, but when it gets extra hot.. I just go with SPF because I will just sweat off good product. I am more apt to reapply during day as well as sometimes rinse my hot sticky face and then  reapply. I figured using a product that is both moisturizer AND SPF, as well as contain some other skin loving, skin barrier building goodies would be perfect. I immediately checked out the offerings of La Roche Posay, and am thrilled to have made this purchase.

Not to scare you off, as it didn't me, but I want to share.. At first, my skin seemed to flush pretty hard upon initial application. It didn't deter me from further use, since there is nothing in it that is troublesome. However, it is a new product for my skin, and it contains niacinamide which my skin never encountered before. Not too concerned, I continued to use it every morning. It seems to be even better as time goes on. I have been using it every single day for nearly a month. My skin didn't get red beyond the first couple of uses and seemed to simmer down a lot. My skin has also seemed mildly greasy at first (a never on my dry skin!), but that too simmered down with repeated use.  It looks really good, or extra good these days!!!!! My skin simply feels happily moisturized and at no point during day does it feel dry, nor does it feel greasy (not sure what that initial reaction was).  I feel like i have done something GOOD FOR MY SKIN when I use this. Hard no to recommend it :)

I have used it alone, I have used it over serums. I have used it under make up. I dont often wear make up, so I cant report much about my experience. When I do, I tend to use a little less than normal, let it set for awhile, then go back and add make-up. Usually my make up also has SPF.

So yeh.. give it a try. Hope this helped. Take care :)

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Comment: Just repurchased this for the second time. I use both the regular moisturizer (night) and the one with SPF (morning). My skin has stayed clear while using this, no breakouts. Definitely one of the better moisturizers Ive tried. I also use the regular one at night and mix it in with my tanning drops sometimes and havent had any issues.

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All
Review Comment:
I’ve been using La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer for a couple of weeks, and I’m so impressed! This moisturizer is perfect for my sensitive skin—it’s lightweight, non-greasy, and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling soft and hydrated without any irritation.

I love that it’s fragrance-free, so it doesn’t cause any redness or discomfort, and it provides long-lasting hydration without clogging my pores. My skin looks smoother and more balanced, and I’ve noticed a reduction in dry patches and flaky skin.

It’s great for daily use, and I can wear it under makeup without it feeling heavy or greasy. The addition of ceramides and niacinamide helps to restore and protect my skin’s moisture barrier, which has made a huge difference in the overall health and appearance of my skin.

If you have sensitive skin or struggle with dryness, I highly recommend this moisturizer—it’s a game changer!

product_title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer | Daily Moisturizer Face Cream with Ceramide and Niacinamide for All

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Title: Smells amazing and just the perfect sheen!
Review Comment:
I bought the grape and it smells JUST LIKE grape soda in all the right ways - I love it!  Unlike other glosses I've tried, this one actually seemed to hydrate my lips instead of drying them out.

It also isn't overly glossy or 'wet', so I don't feel like I'm wearing a bunch of goo or grease - or look like I was just eating extra oily foods.

I'm very pleased with the very light and natural tint it added. It's not 'overly purple' and I don't feel like I've got that 'obviously wearing lip gloss look'.  It just provides a nice natural shine and hydration with a very light tint and delicious scent.  It makes me look more awake, and the bright grape scent makes me FEEL more awake too!

I guess the only watch-out for others would just be to know that the name really DOES fit the scent, and inevitably, the flavor (because it's virtually impossible to not get ANY lip gloss in your mouth, even when you're trying to avoid it).  I'm happy about this because I like grapes and have fond memories of old school grape soda, which this reminds me of, so I'm all good with it. :)

Hopefully this review helps someone else - thanks for reading it!

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr

On Friday I ordered the Vanilla, because it's seemed nearly colorless and I wanted to avoid getting a stain on my sheets as I planned on wearing it 24 hours a day. It arrived on Saturday and today, Monday, my lips are better than ever. YAY! The product is thick and rich, smells beautiful, isn't particularly sticky, and looks pretty. I'm trying to decide what new color to order!

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Comment: While the product is unfortunately very small, it has lasted me a fair while with consistent use. The product itself is a thick luxurious and hydrating balm that is also quite glossy which I LOVE. I have been on the lookout for a cheap, quality, nourishing gloss and this is just perfection! I have tried strawberry and the honeydew and both of the scents and flavors are accurate and not overpowering, just really really nice. For the price point this balm is 1000% worth it and I highly recommend it! I really want to get the vanilla one and a new elf lip liner to pair together because it feels very Christmas to me😆😆😆

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Title: Great product - but beware, the tube is TINY!
Review Comment:
This stuff feels great on your lips. Not sticky like others have noted. Better than some of the alternatives that dry out in about 5 minutes and leave me with parched lips.
The only thing I think they should highlight more in the description is that this tube is miniature. Literally as long as my middle finger. I was really surprised when I opened it.
For $4 (at the time of this review) I guess it's pretty on-par with other products. I have been using a bees wax product that's around $20 a tube and this seems to be doing better for me. Time will tell!

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Title: THIS KEEPS MY LIPS HYDRATED FOR SO LONG!
Review Comment: I purchased this because I saw that it lasts for a long time and is hydrating and it really does. My only complaint is that it is small. I read that, but I was like how small could it be. I promise however small you think it I going to be, it is smaller. Other than that, I love it and will be buying again!

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Comment:
BUY IT, you won't regret it!  After purchasing some of the more expensive laneige ones, I decided to try this elf lip balm. I feel like these work so much better... and for so much less money!  I got two of them - peach & honeydew. The description says there's a sheet tint of color - I didn't find that to be true, to me they go on just like a clear balm. But I'm obsessed with the scents & the formula is non-sticky, in my opinion, just a good slick balm. Peach smells like the peach ring candies, and honeydew actually reminds me of the old B&BW scent cucumber melon. There's definitely a melon scent but it also has this "fresh" smell to it & the only thing I can think to compare it to is the fresh smell that cucumbers have. My teenage daughter actually stole my honeydew, so I had to come back & buy another one!
Final note is that they work really well. I haven't been drinking enough water recently, so my lips were really dry. I put this on at night before going to bed & the next morning, the dryness was significantly less. And after night 3, my lips were back to "normal" - no dryness!
I now have purchased multiples so that I can keep one on my nightstand, one at my desk & one in my purse... so I never have to be without, and at $4 a pop, why not?! A cup of coffee costs more than these little gems!

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Title: A Kiss of Luxury: Exploring E.L.F Lip Balm
Review Comment:
E.L.F, known for its affordable yet high-quality cosmetics, presents its line of lip balms as a delightful fusion of nourishment, color, and style. In this review, we'll uncover the magic behind E.L.F lip balms, exploring their formulation, effectiveness, and the overall experience they offer to beauty enthusiasts.

Affordable Luxury:
E.L.F lip balms stand out in the beauty market for their exceptional quality at an affordable price point. Despite their budget-friendly nature, these balms deliver a luxurious experience that rivals higher-end counterparts. With a range of shades and finishes to choose from, E.L.F caters to diverse tastes and preferences without compromising on quality.

Nourishing Formulation:
One of the hallmarks of E.L.F lip balms is their nourishing formulation, enriched with moisturizing ingredients such as shea butter, jojoba oil, and vitamin E. These hydrating elements work in harmony to soothe dry, chapped lips, leaving them feeling soft, supple, and revitalized. Whether used as a standalone treatment or as a base for lip color, E.L.F lip balms provide long-lasting hydration and protection against environmental stressors.

Versatile Shades and Finishes:
E.L.F offers a wide array of shades and finishes to suit every mood and occasion. From sheer tints for a natural, effortless look to bold hues for a statement-making finish, there's a lip balm to complement any makeup look or personal style. Matte, satin, and glossy finishes add dimension and versatility, allowing users to customize their lip color preferences with ease.

Comfortable Wear:
One of the most appealing aspects of E.L.F lip balms is their comfortable wearability. Unlike some lip products that feel heavy or sticky on the lips, these balms glide on smoothly, providing a lightweight, breathable feel. The non-greasy texture ensures effortless application and all-day comfort, making them ideal for daily wear or on-the-go touch-ups.

Cruelty-Free and Vegan:
E.L.F is committed to cruelty-free and vegan beauty, and its lip balms are no exception. Formulated without animal-derived ingredients or testing, these balms align with ethical and sustainable beauty practices, appealing to conscious consumers who prioritize animal welfare and environmental responsibility.

Accessibility and Availability:
One of the standout features of E.L.F lip balms is their accessibility and availability. Sold at various retailers, including drugstores, beauty stores, and online platforms, they're easily accessible to beauty enthusiasts worldwide. Affordable price points and frequent promotions make them an attractive option for those looking to expand their makeup collection without breaking the bank.

Community and Engagement:
E.L.F fosters a vibrant community of beauty enthusiasts through social media engagement, influencer collaborations, and interactive marketing campaigns. By leveraging digital platforms to connect with consumers and solicit feedback, E.L.F cultivates a sense of inclusivity and belonging within its fan base, fostering a loyal following of beauty enthusiasts who appreciate the brand's commitment to quality, affordability, and innovation.

In conclusion, E.L.F lip balms offer a luxurious yet accessible beauty experience, combining nourishing formulations, versatile shades, and comfortable wearability to delight beauty enthusiasts of all ages and backgrounds. With their affordable price points, cruelty-free ethos, and vibrant community engagement, E.L.F lip balms exemplify the brand's dedication to making high-quality cosmetics accessible to all, one luscious swipe at a time.

product_title: e.l.f. Squeeze Me Lip Balm, Moisturizing Lip Balm For A Sheer Tint Of Color, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-fr
Review Comment:
Has a rich, buttery scent and feel with a texture similar to shea butter. It goes on thicker than a chapstick but becomes slippery as it warms up. The tube is on the smaller size about that of a drugstore chapstick.

I think it does well in a pinch, smells nice and adds a shimmer thats not dissimilar to vaseline or coconut oil. I dont find it particularly hydrating and doesnt hold up in comparison to something like laniege, but is much better than wax chapsticks that only dry out my lips after use. Since it reminded me of shea butter, i usually use it after putting some water or hydrating serum on my lips and it does a great job of sealing that moisture in without being as heavy as a lip oil.

overall good, simple product that I would purchase again.

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Title: Essential Part of My Nighttime Skincare Routine
Review Comment:
This toner has quickly become an essential part of my nighttime skincare routine, and I’m so glad I decided to try it!

• Generously Soaked Pads: The toner pads are well-soaked with just the right amount of product. Every time I swipe one across my face, it delivers a generous amount of toner, leaving my skin feeling refreshed without being overly wet or dry.

• Gentle Yet Effective: I love that the toner doesn’t sting at all. Some toners can be harsh, but this one is soothing and mild, which is great for my skin. The dual-texture design helps with exfoliation, but it’s not abrasive or irritating.

• Minimal Scent: Another big win for me is that it has little to no scent, which is perfect since I prefer products without overpowering fragrances, especially for my night routine.

• AHA for Skin Renewal: I decided to use this toner only at night because of the AHA in it. I appreciate the exfoliating effect, but I prefer to avoid direct sun exposure after using products with AHA. It helps with gently renewing my skin overnight.

If you’re looking for a toner that’s soothing, easy to use, and works well as part of a nighttime regimen, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Comment:
History:10 years of dark spots and severe, super, hyperpigmented melasma unresolved by expensive, prescribed, customized face creams - minimal results at best. Once exposed to sunlight, all progress gone instantly.
 BUT: after 2 weeks of medicube vitamin c pads usage, there is a dramatic and significant difference when I look in the mirror. This product is AMAZING! I simply cannot believe the leaps and bounds of progress made by consistently using this brand. I highly recommend this magic. It definitely works with near immediate results. It’s actually wild how effective it is. I’m so glad I found it by happenstance because they now have a customer for life. I will be buying again.

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Comment:
I landed here because of tiktok and originally I was going to buy the zero pore pads. I suffer from excema in the winter around my eyes and nexk- so trying new products always make me nervous. After looking the all the options, I ultimately decided on the deep vit c pads instead. I used to use naturium vir c and i feel like it did absolutely nothing. I need some antioxidant boost in my skincare routine, everyone does. So after going back and forth from vir c and zero pore along with reviews I added to cart!
These pads still have the abrasive side and smoothe side. One pass abrasive, one pass smoothe. From the FIRST use my skin was So soft I was shook. 3 days in and my skin has been transformed I dont even believe it. It lighten a dark acne spot I had for about 6 months due to a cystic break out, I can guess in another week itll be gone. After the two passes you pad in the excess serum and i actually leave the oad over said mark until it dries. My face looks glowy and healthy even toned. Theres seriously magic in this stuff.
I LOVE that it comes with tweezers and the space in between the suction lid and regular lid is a perfect storage. I agree the packaging is bulky, this wont fit in a standard beauty bad thats how big it is. The box has clear instructions on how to use. Soy ink good for the environment good box packaging.
Scent is VERY mild almost unnoticable. If I had to compare it to something- almost like a clean baby wipe smell. Great value for the price especially when amazon is always having flash sales.

BUY THISSSSS.

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Title: I think I found my vitamin C!!
Review Comment:
I absolutely love these pads! They are super convenient, soaked with plenty of liquid, and feature a smooth side and a lightly textured side. I experienced no irritation, but to be fair, I generally don’t have issues with vitamin C. However, I often avoid using it in the morning because I haven’t found one that works well with makeup, isn’t sticky, or doesn’t leave my face slightly orange. I’ve tried brands like SkinCeuticals, Truth Serum, Osmosis, and Timeless, but none fit seamlessly into my routine.

The only thing I can’t speak to yet is whether this product actually delivers results, which is why I left one star off. If it works, it’s a 10-star product!

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Comment:
Okay, let’s talk about these little magic discs of Vitamin C goodness! If you’re looking to even out your skin tone and tackle those stubborn dark spots caused by sun damage or acne scars, Medicube Deep Vita C Facial Pads might just become your new best friend. 🧡

The Good Stuff:

Dark Spots, Begone! These pads have seriously helped fade my sun spots and acne scars after a few weeks of use. I noticed my skin looking brighter and more even, which was exactly what I was hoping for.
Dual-sided Design: One side is textured for gentle exfoliation (kind of like a mini facial scrub), and the other is smoother for a softer finish. I love that versatility — it’s like a mini spa treatment in a pad.
Fragrance-Free Glory: I really appreciate that there’s minimal fragrance here. No overpowering scents, just pure Vitamin C goodness doing its job!
Proceed with Caution, Sensitive Skin Friends:
If you have sensitive skin like me, just a quick heads up: don’t go overboard! These pads pack a potent punch, and using them daily could lead to irritation (learned that the hard way). I found that using them every other night was the sweet spot — it gave my skin time to adjust without freaking out. Also, expect a little bit of a burn if you’re not used to Vitamin C this strong. It’s not unbearable, but you’ll feel the tingle for sure.

The Results:
Smooth, bright skin after day one? Check! Fewer breakouts and overall improved skin texture with continued use? Double check! These pads have definitely earned a spot in my nighttime routine, though I’d say less is more if your skin is on the sensitive side.

Final Thoughts:
Great for tackling uneven skin tone and scarring, but sensitive skin peeps, use with caution. With the right balance, these pads can leave your skin glowing like a ray of sunshine... but be sure to not go overboard!

Would definitely recommend — just remember: moderation is key. 🌟

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Comment: I ordered these back in July, and just reordered in November with probably another week left. For the first probably month or so I didn’t use these every day. Now I can get away with daily use, but you get about 70 toner pads. Just so others can get an idea of how long these will last. I use these in the am after my shower, exactly as the instructions tell you to, follow up with a toner, my serums, and then moisturizer. I love it. No super crazy “my pores are cleaned out!” “They look so much smaller!”. But I think my complexion is more glowly, I had been looking a little dull prior to these. They’re very convenient with little tongs. I have acne prone, mostly oily but can be combo skin that is hyper sensitive. No issues with these

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Comment:
I rarely write reviews for skincare products, mostly because I never really know if they *do* anything. But, these zero pore pads are the exception.

I bought these pads on a whim to try to brighten my 50+ year old skin, and they do, but that’s not why I’m thrilled. I have mild to moderate sebaceous hyperplasia—those clogged oil glands that look like acne but have a donut hole-like divot and that just get angry if you squeeze them—mostly on my forehead. Nothing truly gets rid of these bumps except for cauterizing them or freezing them at a dermatologist’s office, and I’m procrastinating doing that, because there’s a risk of scarring with that type of treatment. Well, the morning after I used my first zero pore pad, those bumps shrank and flattened! They’re still there, but are probably 50% less obvious, which is a huge win to me. No idea what this witchcraft is, but I have never had a skincare product work so immediately and so obviously. It’s only been a week, but so far, so good. I have to say…. I am a convert!

product_title: Medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0, Dual-Textured Facial Toner Pads for Exfoliation and Pore Care with 4.5% AHA Lactic Acid & 0.45%
Review Comment: I just finished the whole tube and I'm honestly impressed. This has definitely upped my skin care routine. I like to keep it cold in the fridge and use it twice a day after toner. My skin has visibly brightened, stayed hydrated and my dark spots are finally gone. The pads are also thick enough to be used slightly as an exfoliator. It leaves my skin so smooth and feeling refreshed. Worth the money!

product_title: Dove Body Wash with Pump Deep Moisture For Dry Skin Moisturizing Skin Cleanser with 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture Nourishes The
Review Comment:
I purchased Dove's Deep Moisture Body Wash hoping it would help with my dry skin. The product comes in a convenient pump bottle, making it easy to use in the shower. It certainly leaves my skin feeling softer and appears to lock in moisture for a while after use.

However, while it moisturizes effectively, I'm not completely satisfied. The body wash is thicker than I expected, which makes it a bit hard to rinse off completely. Sometimes it leaves a slight residue that doesn't feel entirely clean.

Also, while the moisturizing effect is noticeable, it doesn't last as long as I hoped. I find myself needing to apply lotion soon after drying off, which isn't ideal.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Title: Best lip balm ever. Tried and true.
Review Comment:
If I were trapped on a desert island, which singular item would I take?
BURT’S BEES lip, balm, of course! Okay, and maybe a high quality pocket knife.

I’m a sucker for the original peppermint lip balm. It keeps my lips smooth and soft and I love the way it tingles. I believe it may even help cover up bad breath… After a work lunch one day I applied this exact lip balm and a coworker asked me if I had actually brushed my teeth! I told him no, I just applied my BURT’S BEES peppermint lip, balm!

I have tried so many brands in all price points over the past 20+ years and I find myself always returning to BURT’S BEES. The product consistently meets excellent standards.
The price point is reasonable.
 It’s easy to apply and is a great base for any lip stick or lip gloss you may choose to wear.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Title: At $10 grateful for a fair seller
Review Comment:
Pleasant peppermint and does the job intended.
Not much on the market compares to this when a person is sensitive to chemicals. I use these several times a day even keeping hydrated. Those go-to items you don't realize how often you use until they run out.
Wish the company stayed original (and hope the items continue to stay true), but can't blame them for selling out.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Comment: I'm always losing my chapstick, and so my husband just said, "Order a BUNCH" after searching to no avail.  I felt this was a good compromise :) All flavors are great. I was concerned the strawberry would be too much like the Cherry Chapstick (I guess because they're both red and my brain made a dumb connection.) However, I'm happy to say the strawberry tastes and feels great.  Long lasting, great flavors, easy on sensitive skin.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Comment: I love Burt's Bees lip balm. I like the feel of the balm and it moisturizes my lips well. The balm goes on easily, smoothly, and not too heavy. I also very much appreciate that it is cruelty free! <3

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Comment: Very good quality for a reasonable price. 12 chapsticks for this price is SO good especially since its burts bees. The flavors have a good variety, some xmas themed and some not. Definitely would buy again.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Title: Not sturdy enough to maintain its structure
Review Comment: It has been years since I tried one of these and when I got these, I realized why I stopped using them. Everything is great about them but if you have too much of the lip balm out of the tube, it may break off when trying to use it. This means I need to keep it almost all inside the tube with just a sliver of it outside the tube in order to use it. And that means I'm feeling plastic every time I use it. I'll wait to use these up and then it's time to search for another brand.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Comment:
I've tried loads of different lip balms over the years, and nothing comes close to the relief and healing I get from Burt's Bees. Whatever combination of oils and waxes they use just feels right.

It is on the thicker side of the spectrum, but it's not cloying or too heavy. The peppermint flavor is slightly medicinal, but in a good way, and isn't noticeable after just a few minutes. Most other flavors and up being too powerful and unpleasant after a while. As far as I'm concerned, there's no reason to get anything else.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Comment: I'm picky when it comes to my chapped lips. I want something that's soothing and has a pleasant taste. This pink grapefruit lip balm is great! It's my favorite Bert's Bees product. I will definitely buy again.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Comment: What can you say about Burt's Bees original lip balm? It's fabulous, it's buttery, it's minty, it's great. Love it. I've been using it for years and have it on subscribe and save. Even take boxes in to work and give them to colleagues who forget their own lip balm.

product_title: Burt's Bees Lip Balm Stocking Stuffers, Moisturizing Lip Care Christmas Gifts, Original Beeswax with Vitamin E & Peppermint O
Review Title: Great Replacement For The Merry Hempster
Review Comment: Used The Merry Hempster lemon or lime vegan lip balm literally for decades. Can't find that any more. Tried this Burt's Bees formula. Not quite the same smooth lubricant feeling going on but certainly satisfactory & way more nutrients in it.

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Title: Wish I found this mascara sooner!
Review Comment: Safe yourself the time, trouble & $$$, I’ve researched & tried out countless mascaras, both high end, drugstore & what feels like everything in between - THIS mascara reigns supreme. I have stick straight almost downturned, thin but long lashes that don’t hold a curl for anything until THIS mascara. It doesn’t feel like you have anything on, this mascara doesn't weigh them down AND somehow keeps them separated but simultaneously lush & voluminous. FINALLY, a mascara that delivers on its claims! I think depending on the amount of coats you apply, this could easily win over those who like a natural wispier looks as well as those who are heavier handed with multiple coats for a more glam look. So happy I tried this with the sale. I purchased the travel size as I don’t wear make up everyday & on the advice of those that stated the full-size could dry out quicker? I honestly truly love that it’s a drier formula as wetter formulas quickly weigh my lashes down as well as transfer to my skin easier whereas this one doesn’t as that’s another struggle I have with oiler skin/eyelids. Anyway, BUY THIS!! Especially while it’s on sale, you will not regret it ! 🥰

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment: An influencer shared this product and I absolutely fell in love with this mascara- in fact even repetitively buy this specific one only now. I have sensitive eyes; but this mascara is not heavy feeling and stays on all day

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment: This mascara is amazing.  it doesn't smear throughout the day.  it goes on very smooth.  i had one of these for a year and it lasted that long without getting old.  i didn't use it daily but i used it quite a bit.  this is definitely my favorite mascara.

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment: The tube itself is oddly very light which I like. I liked the formula, it's very easy to wash off with makeup wipes and the brush is as described. The brush type expands the lashes and makes the most out of whatever volume you have. I will say though that the Maybelline Colossal Cat Eye mascara is a very good alternative if you prefer a more economic choice. The wands work just as good. Only difference is the Lancome formula seems to be smoother, silkier. It's still buildable. You just need more layers compared to the maybelline mascara

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment:
Super sleek, nice packaging. The mascara is not clumpy or watery. The consistency is just right. Easy applicator. Washes off well.
Good value.

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment:
Lash Idole is my favorite mascara.  I have tried A LOT: Valentino, Tower 28, Ilia, Monsieur Big, Lisa Eldridge, Rare Beauty and basically every Sephora sample mascara that has come out in the past ten years, but I jsut can't quit Lash Idole.  I do also like the Lisa Eldridge and Ilia mascara, but this is my fave.  If I was super volume, then Monsieur Big is good.

This separates my lashes, gives them some color (blonde lashes), and some length.  I prefer a more natural, separated look and despise clumpy lashes.

This gets better with use, and after the first use or two, it dries out a tiny bit which I prefer.  It can be a little too liquidy when you first open a bottle.  Anyway, this is my holy grail and I don't think I will ever stop using it.

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment: I love the way it goes on and it does not irritate my eye lids. And Yes, it really does extend your lashes. Very nice! Love it.

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment:
I’m so glad everyone else loves this product! I gave me an allergic dermatitis reaction. It was the worst around my eyes but also happened on the rest of my face from when I would cleanse and unknowingly spread the mascara.

I actually didn’t know/think this was causing it for a while. I thought it was something else. I cut out a bunch of stuff. Once I stopped using this, my skin calmed down and went back to normal.

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment: My favorite mascara. Was disappointed to see the packaging in such shape. Not sure if it was a returned product. It would also be inconvenient for me to drop this off if I request a replacement. Oh well ;(

product_title: Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara - Black Mascara for Instant Volume, Length & Lift - Smudge Proof & Up To
Review Comment: Just don’t last long enough I noticed it starting to get stiff airy about a month but it lengthens and brings them out real nice

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Title: Brightening, moisturizing, blends well with concealer (but affects waterproof liquid eyeliners)
Review Comment:
The title of my review covers my main thoughts on this product.  But I'm a firm believer that cosmetics and other skin products do not belong in the "one-size-fits-all" category.  Everyone has different skin types, issues, and lifestyles.  So the more info someone can get about how a product worked for a certain kind of person and how that person used it, the better they can decide if it's worth trying for themselves.

Read on if you want more info.  I'll put headers so you can skip to what you think is important.

*If you don't feel like reading, just know:  I'd mainly recommend this product as a subtle under eye brightener for someone with normal to dry or wrinkled/creased skin.  It's not the best product out there, but it does a great for the current price.  I think it's good value. It can work for someone who prefers a low maintenance skin routine or a person who really likes to experiment with cosmetics to achieve a specific look.)

WHICH COLOR I BOUGHT AND WHY:  I purchased the pink-toned undereye brightener since I have really fair (mostly neutral toned) skin.  The skin under my eyes can look very dull and dry sometimes, but it doesn't really turn a very noticeable dark tone.  Occasionally, it may take on a very faint bluish-purple hue.

WHAT DROVE ME TO TRY THIS SPECIFIC PRODUCT?  I actually bought this along with another product that promised to create a similar look, but which seemed like a formula that better fit my lifestyle.  (It came in small tube with an applicator and was waterproof.
I tend to look for cosmetics that offer convenience, can fit safely in my pocket without breaking, have maximum staying power, and that are non-comedogenic.)  However, I also decided to try this under eye brightener because I read that it was non-drying and kind of moisturizing.  I recently dried the heck out of the skin under my eyes, and I figured I needed something that could help with damage control until I could handle the other product.  (Waterproof and no-budge cosmetics tend to be drying.)
 I also liked how reviewers were consistently saying this product was very sheer, subtle, and not glittery or too sparkly.  I was on the hunt for something "brightening" as in illuminescent, glowing, or even slightly pearlescent.  I definitely did not want anything glittery, sparkly, metallic, etc.

WHAT IS MY SKIN TYPE & ANY ISSUES I'M HAVING RIGHT NOW THAT MAKES THIS PRODUCT IDEAL FOR ME?  I have combination type skin right now... oily in the T-zone, but more normal to dry around my cheeks and especially under my eyes.  I have to use an oil-controlling, mattifying product daily.  Otherwise, parts of my face will look outrageously shiny/greasy.
 But I kind of got lazy with my skin care and makeup routine as the weather got colder and dryer.  I started overusing the shine control products and applying it recklessly.  I was applying a super drying mattifying serum/primer all over my face... even blending it under my eyes, knowing I absolutely did not need any oil-absorbing or otherwise drying products in that specific area.

Next thing I knew, my undereye skin was dull and somewhat patchy looking.  My normal undereye concealer just wasn't cutting it anymore.  In fact, since my skin became so dried out, the various concealers I would normally use all looked streaky, creased, and/or dry within minutes to hours.  They made me look sloppy, tired, or older.  I did try using a heavier moisturizer around my eyes, and it was helping to get my skin back to normal... just not as quickly as I wanted.  And for some reason, it was causing some of my concealers to lose a lot of coverage power or to eventually settle on my face in a very streaky or creased way.

Then this little miracle finally arrived!

WHAT WAS MY FIRST IMPRESSION OF THIS PRODUCT?  I was honestly skeptical when I first saw it and touched it.  It has a very pink tone when it's just sitting in the container.  There didn't appear to be anything "brightening" about it.  It looked like a thick, strongly pigmented salmon pink paste.  And then I touched it with my finger.  I would say it has a texture that's in between a gel-like cream and a balm.  Very slippery.  I was worried I just wasted my money on a weird pink-colored balm that was going to melt down my face within an hour or so.

I was wrong.  With this product, less is more.  (That also means there is a lot of product in the tiny pot. So for the price, it's an excellent value.)  The product applied smoothly under my eyes.  I didn't like how it looked at first, but I realized I had just applied too much... and I applied it over other makeup that had already dried out on my skin.  When I tried again with less product and a clean face, I was very happy with the results.

The product is VERY SHEER.  Don't expect it to cover any blemishes or really dark spots.  I wouldn't really call it shimmery either.  It basically reflects light in a way that makes your dull or slightly darkened skin less noticeable.  It has a subtle and natural looking effect.  The first time I wore it without any other cosmetics on, my daughter commented that I looked like I finally caught up on some sleep.  She actually asked to take a closer look at my face.  She noticed I looked "better," but couldn't figure out why.  It's the perfect product for anyone trying to achieve the deceiving "no makeup" look.  (Not gonna lie... it feels good when people really believe you just naturally look youthful and vibrant.)

The makeup worked well with my moisturizer, and I feel like it helped restore my skin to it's normal state.  I'd say it has some moisturizing properties to it.  If anything, it's at least non-drying.

As far as longevity, this product doesn't have much staying power at all.  As my skin returned to a more normal state, the undereye cream became easier to accidentally wipe off or to just naturally fade away after a few hours.

I didn't dock a star for that because I kind of liked reapplying it mid-day. It feels slightly cooling.  I also found a work around for the longevity problem!

HOW I TYPICALLY USE IT:  I mostly use this undereye brightener to enhance my other plain undereye concealers (which are mostly medium coverage).  I'll mix the two products together on the back of my hand or directly on my face.  I get most of the coverage and staying power of my normal concealer, and the light reflecting and overall brightening properties of this product.  I sometimes apply it to my brow bone or the inner corners of my eye, too.  The other similar product I mentioned at the start of this review turned out to be very waterproof and smudge-resistant.  But it was also very drying, heavily pigmented, and difficult to blend despite being a liquid.  I found that it actually blends very well with this product, though.  And the two combined make for a brighter, less subtle look with enough staying power to last a good 14 hrs or so.  The two combined are better for carefully applying around the eyes with a makeup sponge for a contouring effect.

Basically, I found this undereye brightener to be great when used alone or to enhance other cosmetics.  I like it.  It's very versatile.

If you decide to try it, just make sure you're not allergic to any ingredients and you pick the appropriate color to match your skin tone and needs.  If it doesn't work well the first time you apply it, play around with it a bit.  My daughter is a very young adult. She has borrowed this eye brightener to rub on parts of her face for a natural-looking dewy, glowing complexion.  (I can't get away with that due to my combination type skin type.)

OTHER HELPFUL INFO:  If you're like me and rely on waterproof liquid eyeliner, you should know that this will negatively affect your eyeliner's staying power.  When the two cosmetics are overlapped at any point, the eyeliner seems to lose its water-resistance abilities.  In fact, this undereye cream can actually remove/dissolve some really strong waterproof liquid liners.  I think because it's kind of oily/greasy in a way.  (Kind of like Pond's cold cream will remove super stubborn eyeliner.
Except this eye brightener is not THAT strong.)

I only line the top of my lids, but my eyes kind of slope downwards.  So, I try to be careful not to blend this undereye cream too close to my lower lashline (in case it transfers to my upper eyelids) or too close to the outer sides of my eyes.  So far, that tactic had worked for me.

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Comment: I used to use smashbox under eye brightening which is $33 for about the same size container. This product is literally identical and works just as well for a fraction of the cost. I have genetically dark circles, so I just like to use something under my eyes on days I don’t want to do a full face of makeup. This is perfect for just that. It’s super creamy and pigmented which is nice. I got the light rose which is good to combat my purple bags under my eyes. I am really happy with this purchase. I don’t take a lot of time to come back and review, but definitely wanted to share in case there’s other people who don’t do their makeup everyday, but want to cover their bags for regular daily wear. Highly recommend.

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Comment: I have very dark under eye circles and have tried  several peach colored correctors, but I have very fair skin so no matter how much I blended it seemed too dark. I tried this product and it blended perfectly. It goes on very smooth and covers under eye discoloration. My only issue with this product is it is on the greasy/oily side, but I just put a tiny amount of translucent setting powder over it and it’s fine.

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Comment: Product is on my left eyelid and under-eye in the photo. My right eyelid and under-eye is bare. I applied it with a finger. It works really well!! I don’t know how it’ll hold up over the course of a day so I am using e.l.f Power Grip Primer to keep it on. I have very light skin with prominent freckles and the coverage looks natural without covering them up much, so no weird contrast. My under-eyes are quite purpley and I had been using a green color correcting concealer in the past but this product (010 Light Rose) is so much better without having to blend it all weirdly. I highly recommended!

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Comment: I read about this product on Buzzfeed and thought I would give it a try. I have dark circles under my eyes. I was hoping to find a product that could mask them, without it being too heavy. When I used the brightener, I noticed just a subtle difference. I think I only noticed it because I knew I had applied the product underneath my eyes. However, when I asked others for their opinion, they didn't notice any difference, or if a product was even used. Later in the day, my eyeliner was smudging off on it, leaving faint black spots. Just to note, when I don't wear the brightener, my eyeliner does not smudge off. I not sure why the brightener would cause my make up to smear over time.

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Comment:
I’ve always been plagued with darkness under my eyes.  I don’t know if it’s a hormonal imbalance, poor diet, a combination of the two? Who knows.
All I know is that I don’t like it and this under eye brightener does the trick! See my picture. I use the vitamin e stick under my eyes to help fill in any lines that will get caked with make up and this helps to smooth out my skin too.  I then apply the brightner and the difference is incredible! I don’t have any other make up on in the picture, just the brightener on the one side. A little goes a long ways and it looks like one jar will last a really long time. I’m hooked!

product_title: Catrice | Under Eye Brightener | Conceal & Brighten Dark Circles | With Hyaluronic Acid & Shea Butter | Vegan, Cruelty Free &
Review Comment:

product_title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Washable Mascara Makeup, Volumizing, Lengthening, Defining, Curling, Multiplying, Builda
Review Comment: I feel like I’ve tried so many mascaras in my life - both high end and drug store and I honestly always keep coming back to this one. product_title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Washable Mascara Makeup, Volumizing, Lengthening, Defining, Curling, Multiplying, Builda
Review Comment: This black Maybelline mascara is amazing! It gives my lashes incredible volume and length without clumping. product_title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Washable Mascara Makeup, Volumizing, Lengthening, Defining, Curling, Multiplying, Builda
Review Comment:
I have a complicated relationship with mascara. I don't exactly love it, but I kinda need it because my lashes are so light blonde that when I don't wear any, I look like I don't even have lashes. One complicated aspect of our relationship is either they change, or I do. I LOVED Tightline by It Cosmetics - even wore at my wedding - but they changed the formula and the product was drying up in less than two weeks. I wore the super cheap Essence waterproof mascara for a couple of years, then it started irritating my eyes; they could have changed something, or maybe I developed an allergy; I'm not sure. I even thought I had found a holy grail in Lancome's Définicils, but then *I* changed my esthetic and decided I wanted to wear brown to meld better with my strawberry blonde hair.

That's how I arrived here. I watched a strawberry blonde Tiktoker discussing her makeup routine, and she uses this in brown. She said it was a true brown, instead of a black-brown like most mascara companies make - which is kind of insulting to us, the customers who want/need a brown, but the companies think we're unsure of this and the difference between black and black-brown is not even noticeable when you have it on. 🙄 I don't know if I would consider this a "true brown", it's definitely not black, but it lacks the warmth and brightness of a true brown - like the brown of Cabaret's mascara (which is beautiful, but doesn't go on well and clumps terribly). The Sky High has a similar applicator, but the formula is much better - more smooth and creamy and not clumpy at all. It's also a tubing mascara, which, if you haven't tried a tubing, you don't know what you're missing! It stays put, but comes off with just warm water and a gentle tug. That is the biggest reason I'm giving it four stars: it DOES lengthen a LOT, without clumping or adding too much volume (I'm not a fan of the voluminous mascaras, myself; I prefer one that improves color and definition).

If you like black, or black-brown mascaras that will give you length, without adding volume, and prefer a rubbery,  spiny applicator over a thinner brush or spoolie type applicator, this one is for you. I just place more priority on color because I have none on my natural lashes and black can look too harsh on my fair skin and with my light-colored hair.

So, off I go! On my quest for the "perfect" mascara...

product_title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Washable Mascara Makeup, Volumizing, Lengthening, Defining, Curling, Multiplying, Builda
Review Comment: This is a really nice inexpensive mascara - definitely water proof as far as pouring rain outside.  Haven't tried in the pool but don't intend to either.  It doesn't flake, smudge or smear.  It lengthens lashes nicely.  Best of all, even though it's waterproof, it washes right off in the shower without under eye smudges left!  Def recommend.

product_title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Washable Mascara Makeup, Volumizing, Lengthening, Defining, Curling, Multiplying, Builda
Review Title: The non-waterproof is great, be careful though with the waterproof if you accidently buy it.
Review Comment: Do not accidentally order the waterproof, you need dynamite to remove it!! There should be levels of waterproof mascara, not one for all no matter what the application is. If you're a swimmer or expect to be in water where you truly need something that doesn't run, then it should be "level 1 waterproof, if you just need to know it's not going to smear or run in damp environment then it should be level 2, ect... Even their non-waterproof mascara in this brand is difficult to just wash off, but much easier than the waterproof one. I wish they would change the labeling and add level's to the waterproof and non-waterproof so you don't have to ripe out your eyelashes to remove it. I even used a high end eye make-up remover and it could not remove it. Just had to wash my eyes every day hoping it would eventually break down and come off.

Review Comment:

product_title: TruSkin Vitamin C Serum – Anti Aging Facial Serum with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E and More – Brightening Serum for
Review Title: Vitamin c DOES work well with retinol
Review Comment:
I will post more pics when I notice a more significant change. I wanted to address the myth I've seen blasted all over the reviews posted here.
I have heard for a long time that vitamin c and retinol cannot be used together. That they cancel each other out. It's completely untrue. My problem is that I've heard it so many times. I believed it to be fact regardless of the sources I heard it from. Which is basically word of mouth by other women who do not hold a dermatological degree of any sort. I did my own research. And actual skin care experts that hold a degree say the opposite. Retinol CAN be used with vitamin c products. Successfully. They don't cancel each other out. They work beautifully together. And vitamin c actually helps retinol work BETTER by stabilizing it and extending its effectiveness. It turns out that using retinol without vitamin c or any other potent antioxidant is keeping your skin from reaping all the benefits of using retinol!!! Which is why this serum is so important in your skin care regimen. You know all those expensive anti aging moisturizers you've been blowing your money on? Well........without using this serum or any other serum close to this that has vitamin c in it prior makes your fancy skin cream ineffective. And we all want to get the most out of the money we spend to make our skin look fabulous. Don't we?
I've also seen reviews on here about this product complaining about the color change in the serum. Did they not read about the product? I states very clearly that it's normal to see variations of color. Clear or cloudy. All depending on the time of the year the ingredients are harvested contribute. And it is very clearly addressed in the description of this product. Pretty much cancelling out any of the bad reviews made on this product.
Ladies. If you want to make the most out of your skin care products. Read up on them first. That's why the info is there. So If anyone has any complaints on this product. They are not using it correctly!!!!!
I've included a photo in the first week of use. I will post more down the road. I am 40 years old. I smoked heavily for over 20 years(quit January 2017) and drank pretty bad too for 13 years before I got sober 7 years ago. My skin was terrible!!!! I have absolutely no makeup on. Just moisturizer and carmex lip balm. I use this product with a retinol moisturizer. I also take collagen daily as well. Hopefully this review helps clear up the myths of using certain anti aging products together. And their (in)effectiveness. Us ladies gotta stick together in this war on aging and kick some wrinkle butt!!!! Lol!💪💪💪

Review Comment: I just received my second order of this vitamin C serum, and I'm really bummed that I got a bad batch. The dropper glass has brown stains and the serum is yellow. When I looked it up, it said that it could be due to oxidation that's caused by a fluctuation in temperature and direct sunlight. It says that the serum has more than likely lost its potency, but that it's still safe to use. Ugh... I already threw out the packaging, so I won't be returning it. I'll probably mix it with a hand lotion or something. I LOVED my first bottle! The serum actually got rid of some dark spots on my forehead and shrunk the pores around my nose. I wasn't expecting that. I plan on waiting a bit before I order another bottle, and hopefully they'll have fixed the problem by then. If I experience the same issue on my 3rd bottle, I'll end my subscription. For now, I'm off to the store to buy my Vitamin C serum in person. I say, you give it a try. I'm in my 40's and it's hard to find something that makes my skin look younger. Just make sure the serum is clear when you receive it. Store it in a cool, dark place to help it retain its potency. Good luck! I would have given it 5 stars had there not been concerns about how the company is conducting quality control.

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist 240mL/8.1 fl oz.
Review Title: smells truly wonderful. I GOT 62 40 and 87
Review Comment:
Im new to this brand. I have 62. Which smells like pistachio caramel and vanilla. But in perfume form? Hard to describe. I use the body wash as lotion because i love layering like that. I got compliments the first time I wore this. It smells absolutely wonderful wonderful wonderful!!!!!!!! Seriously it smells awesome.

Perosonal tip: the vanilla and sweet notes dont mix well when your skin starts to sweat even a little. Actually no perfume does. Do you wonder if your perfume is offensive to others? I did. What works for me is to spray your perfume on your clothes not on your skin. It stays on for a lot longer! The smell on my sweater was there for a week after I first wore this! It absolutely has staying power which is unheard of for a body spray. Second, I store all my sprays in the fridge. They smell better and last longer and slows down the musky notes that perfumes tend to get.  Last, I spray this on my shirt and sleeves thirty mins before I leave the house. It smells way better than spraying right before you leave. And I am generous when I use this because its body spray not perfume.

I also got 40. It wasnt my favorite. It smells too flowery and old lady like. But still smelled very good in its own way.  Good enough I would wear this around the house. This line makes good scents what can I say.

Lastly, I got 87 which is my absolute favorite. This smells like coconut the beach and sunscreen. I personally love the smell of sunscreen! It doesnt have any creams you can buy unfortunately like the rest of the scents. What I do is use the chamomile conditioner from the Garnier line as lotion. Its the perfect match for me. This one smells sooo good. Theres no way this can be too strong. It just smells like pure happiness and super feminine. All three of these scents were blind purchases for me by the way.

The reviews for this helped me so much, I wanted to help someone out there that was thinking about buying one or many.  Good luck and get ready for the compliments!!!

product_title: Sol de Janeiro Hair & Body Fragrance Mist 240mL/8.1 fl oz.
