product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Comment:
Firstly, the smell is wonderful! The mint is more dominant but I like the subtleness of the rosemary. Once it’s in your hair and dries i find it fantastic because then the rosemary is the pleasant without being overbearing.

Second; A little goes a long way! I use this while my hair is still damp then massage into scalp/brush it to spread into the length. You could add it to your ends as well, but for me my scalp is my target area because i have some thinning on my crown.

I know that it is going to take some time to see results. Nothing is an overnight miracle (we can dream!). I had some baby hairs already from using a rosemary mint conditioner (dr. Feels) a got this to suppliment on top of using that hoping it will speed up the growth I have. So i do have good faith this works for growth.

If regrowth is not your goal,no worries! My healthy hair has never felt better as well! I had very fine brittle pin straight hair but since incorporating this into my routine i have noticed its put some body and life back into it! So soft and i can see the difference in how much better it looks/feels. This was a big deal for me because this hair journey has been a looong struggle and finally seeing some results was enough to bring me to happy tears (and i am not a cryer!)

Get this stuff! Seriously, it’s a game changer.

My package arrived just fine. Nothing was leaking or broken.

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Title: Always impressed by this product and brand overall
Review Comment: Best pre wash scalp treatment I have ever used. I have seborrheic dermatitis and it gets so bad that I will scratch and bleed, scab, etc. I part my hair middle, near ears, and halfway between those and drop it. Then i use one of the spiked scalp shampoo massagers to softly massage it in. Wait at least 15 minutes for it to work its magic, then in the shower I use 1 part acv to 5 parts water in a squirt bottle or mason jar and rinse with that. Then use a salicylic acid shampoo (shea moisture is my favorite or the as i am line) and let that sit for about five minutes. Then rinse and repeat. Then smell good shampoo once, then conditioner ONLY ON ENDS. I have 3c curls with pops of 3b here and there and have always struggled with my scalp until this product. I even use a little on my ends as well!

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Title: Helps to Alleviate Hair Loss and Itchy Scalp
Review Comment:
This is a good product for hair loss due to stress or other factors.  This is not an instant miracle product, but one that requires regular use over time. The oil is thin, absorbs quickly and helps alleviate itching.  It feels cool and medicinal on the scalp.
I began using this oil when I experienced some hair loss and have been satisfied with the results.  After a few weeks of regular use, I noticed the hair growing back in. Now, I use it less frequently.
The amber-colored glass bottle helps maintain the integrity of the product and not much oil is needed for daily application.  The scent is very strong, but not unpleasant; the mint and rosemary fragrances are distinct and you should be careful not to get any into your eyes.  It is not a product you might want to use before a romantic date; the smell might overpower your perfume and be rather jarring to someone else.  I've found bedtime to be the best time to apply this oil; after application, I cover my hair with a scarf to prevent oil stains on my linen.
I've also used this as an emergency insect repellent for my feet and ankles during mosquito season and it works, due to the rosemary oil (which mosquitoes apparently hate). Overall, a great product to keep on hand in the medicine cabinet.

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Comment: I’ve been using this for about a month and a half and so far, I don’t think I’ve noticed any difference as far as growth goes, BUT, I do notice it makes my hair really soft and smooth. (I have medium length, thick, wavy hair) I use it about once or twice a week and leave it in about an hour before washing my hair. One week, I had forgotten to use it and noticed my hair wasn’t as soft after washing. Also, I noticed my hair is less frizzy after I’ve used it. Those two things are worth keeping it and using it.

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Comment: I don’t think it is a good idea to leave in for my not very thin but soft hair. I just washed my hair and message a drop of oil to smooth my dry scalp and my hair became very greasy, looks like a week not cleaning the hair. But I do think it is a good product to smooth scalp, I message it to my scalp for a few minutes before shampoo. I found my hair are very soft with using any conditioner or hair oil. And i don’t feel dry scalp anymore but I always fell dry scalp after any shampoo (aveeno  Morocco oil hydrating every one)

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce

Y me deja el cabello bonito hermoso y precioso bien brillante y suave, espero que me funcione en un futuro voy a actualizar este comentario

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Title: I wish I could give it more stars
Review Comment:
so I turned 40 and I have been noticing so much fall out in the shower.. like it’s crazy how much hair I lose. I still have really long really thick hair, so you can’t really tell, but it just bothers me seeing that much hair in the shower and my hairbrush.. makes me wonder how much more hair I would have if I didn’t shed so much!!

Anyway, I came across this product in an effort to thicken my hairline. Originally, I came on here to get Minoxidil but somehow found this instead. I ended up purchasing this the shampoo, the conditioner, and the leave in. I did not get the hair mask because there were too many reviews of people saying it made their hair fall out too quick all at once in the beginning… Which if you look up hair growth products such as Minoxidil (Rogaine), that’s a possible side effect because it can cause a ton of shedding at once.. and that can freak people out.  Kinda scared me so I figured an essential oil would probably be safer, and there is tons of peer reviewed papers about the effectiveness of rosemary oil and hair growth by way of stimulating the hair follicle.

Just for reference, I have long thick brown hair (caucasian) and YES this is heavy on my hair if i’m not really careful how much I use, but I wear my hair up in a slicked pony/bun 7 days a week so it’s not a problem for me.  On the rare occasion that I wear my hair down, I use the shampoo and the conditioner and very very little leave in.  Tbh, I’m not that crazy about the leave in conditioner but I’m very happy with this particular product so I want to give it a chance.  The shampoo I really like, and the conditioner is pretty good, too.

Look I don’t want to jinx myself or anything lol but ever since the first day I put this oil on my scalp, I barely shed at all.  I wish I had pics.. the shower is so much less traumatic when i’m not losing so much hair every time I wash it.  At first, I used the dropper but that can be messy.. and since I have European hair, I can’t just put it on my scalp between braids.. so I had to get one of those oil dispensers that have the steel balls you roll over your scalp.  The only ones that actually work are the $25 range with a little red light and vibrations but well worth it.  I tried to be cheap and buy one for under $10 but that was a mistake because the oil wouldn’t come out and it was just too difficult.  I returned it and bought a different one with good reviews that works every time.  I usually dilute it with a little water just so it comes out easier.  I am so happy I found this product.

ps.  I never took a before picture… But I literally just washed my hair, took a pic of the drain collection, and came on here to update this. That little teeny TINY wad of maybe 20 hairs is my entire fallout from washing today. My hair is 24 inches and normally I lose 10 times that amount.. that’s underestimating.. It’s usually a legit handful of hair. Like this is nothing. I’m so excited to see how my hair looks when I actually keep the majority of it on my head instead of it going down the drain !!

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Title: A Refreshing Treat for Your Scalp
Review Comment:
This oil is a winner for anyone looking to invigorate their scalp and promote healthy hair growth.
The rosemary and mint blend is incredibly refreshing and invigorating. It leaves your scalp feeling clean and energized. I've noticed a significant improvement in my scalp health since using this oil. It helps to soothe dryness, and support hair growth.
While I can't definitively say it's the sole reason, I've seen noticeable growth in my hair since incorporating this oil into my routine. This oil can be used on all hair types, making it a great option for everyone.

It's a bit pricier than some other scalp oils on the market.

Usage -
I apply a few drops of oil to my scalp, massaging it in gently. I leave it in for at least 30 minutes before washing my hair. I also use it as a pre-shampoo treatment once a week.
Overall - This is a fantastic scalp oil that I highly recommend. It's effective, refreshing, and versatile. Just be sure to use it sparingly to avoid greasiness.

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Title: Disappointed – Unexpected Hair Loss After Use
Review Comment:
I had high hopes for the Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil, especially with its natural ingredients and strengthening claims. However, my husband unfortunately experienced noticeable hair loss after using it for a while, which was surprising and concerning. The scent is refreshing, and it felt nice on the scalp, but the hair loss has left us unsure about continuing with it. It might work differently for others, but it’s something to consider if you’re prone to sensitivity. We’ll be cautious with similar products in the future.

UPDATE 11/07/24: I appreciate that Mielle Organics took my review seriously and reached out to me. While there isn't anything further I need or can do at this point, I value their proactive response and dedication to customer satisfaction. Although the product didn’t work for my husband, I recognize it still has potential for other uses and may work well for others. For their exceptional customer service, I am updating my review to five stars. Thank you for your consideration and effort!

product_title: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil for All Hair Types, 2 Ounce
Review Title: Nourishing and Strengthening with a Refreshing Touch
Review Comment:
Performance and Benefits: The oil is lightweight and absorbs easily into the scalp and hair without leaving a greasy residue. It helps to nourish and strengthen hair from the roots to the tips, promoting healthier growth and reducing breakage. Infused with rosemary and mint, it provides a cooling, soothing sensation that stimulates the scalp and improves circulation, which is beneficial for overall hair health.

Scent and Sensation: The rosemary and mint blend delivers a pleasant, invigorating scent that is both refreshing and relaxing. The minty aroma is not too overpowering, making it enjoyable to use as part of your hair care routine. The cooling effect on the scalp adds to the overall experience, creating a sense of revitalization.

Application and Use: The oil comes in a convenient dropper bottle, which allows for precise application directly to the scalp or along the hair shafts. This makes it easy to target specific areas that need extra care or to apply evenly throughout the hair. It can be used as a pre-shampoo treatment, a leave-in conditioner, or a styling aid, offering versatility in how you incorporate it into your routine.

Drawback: One minor drawback is that the oil’s consistency can be a bit thicker than expected, which may require more effort to distribute evenly through fine hair. For those with very fine or oily hair, it’s advisable to use sparingly to avoid weighing hair down.

Overall Impression: The Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil is a high-quality product that provides effective nourishment and strength to all hair types. Its refreshing scent and versatile application make it a valuable addition to any hair care routine. Despite the minor issue with consistency, the oil delivers excellent results in promoting healthier, stronger hair and a revitalized scalp.

Review Comment: I had been contemplating ordering this for several weeks.  Then my current hair dryer finally broke and I pulled the trigger. I was skeptical but boy, was I surprised and impressed!!  It has cut my hair drying time in half!!  Makes my hair super shiny and is fun to use!!!  Love it!

product_title: L'ANGE HAIR Le Volume 2-in-1 Titanium Blow Dryer Brush | Hot Air Brush in One with Oval Barrel | Hair Styler for Smooth, Friz
Review Title: Unbelievable!  So easy and my hair feels amazing!
Review Comment: I've been using hot curling brushes for over a decade, I've tried several brands - some better than others but they always required 2 hands to keep your hair wrapped around the brush.  This is truly one-handed use!  The others also had their on/off buttons on the shaft and I would accidentally turn off the brush in the middle of use - so frustrating!  This one has no button, you just turn the base of the brush and never have to worry about accidentally shutting it off or changing the heat setting.  I do want to mention that the bristles of this hot air curling brush are luxurious!  They grasp the hair perfectly and feel wonderful against my scalp - almost like a mini-scalp massage!  I was a bit worried about the large size shaft and handle on this, but it actually feels great in my hand and the no-slip rubber handle gives me much more control during use.  I will be bringing it to my hairdresser so she can see/try it out.  I can't say enough good about this hot air drying brush. You won't regret purchasing it!

Review Comment:
So i have never liked the hairdryer brushes. They leave my thin hair so frizzy.  I bought this bc of the reviews and bc im so tired of blow drying my hair with a brush and blower (makes my arms hurt so much-especially my hands since i have arthritis).

I used it on my towel dried hair. I didnt put any products before using  bc i wanted to see what it really did to my hair. As soon as i started using it i was obsessed. It left my hair SO nice and full with ZERO frizz. Even after i left the house there is no frizz. I have a really big issue with volume where i have to use multiple products to make my hair look like i have body. After i used this brush i didnt have to use any products. I love it!!

You do have to be careful bc it gets very hot. I got burned but thats just bc i held it wrong but it is SO easy to use.

Its also very good quality. Looks expensive!

The cord is just the right length and doesnt get in the way.

I got soooo many compliments when i left my house. I give it a 5/5!!!

product_title: SOL DE JANEIRO Jet Set
Review Title: Perfect Gift for a Young Teen
Review Comment: My granddaughter turned 13 last week--a very important milestone these days. 13 is the new 18. She is too old for the things she used to love to get as gifts and too young for lots of teenaged things. She is aware now about makeup and perfume and, gulp, boys. This gift set was perfect. The scent is happily innocent, not too this, not too that. The perfume encourages her to take care of her appearance without going overboard. And she feels confident and officially a teenager. Even better her mom and dad approve. The gift box is beautiful and goes nicely right on her bedside table. And the gift set gives her a feeling of being grown up without leaving her childhood too quickly behind. And the exotic name helps--apparently the name has a lot of cachet with her friends.

product_title: SOL DE JANEIRO Jet Set
Review Title: Good value, but still kinda small
Review Comment: I was glad I bought this little kit to try out first.  I just wish there was a little more to it!  The spray is small, but it is a travel size.  (I didn't really understand that at purchase but whatever).  It does fit easily into a makeup bag or purse pocket and I have carried it with me.  I truly love this fragrance.  I was beyond thrilled to hear my husband say he liked it too.  The body wash is awesome.  And I probably use a little more than necessary, but definitely not excessive.  And I was just disappointed when I went to use it for the 3rd time, I could hear in the bottle that I only had one more use left. IDK  it seems like there is plenty of room in there to fill it up all the way.  But honestly, this is a trend I am seeing a lot lately.  I get 2 monthly makeup type subscriptions and I see this often.  The travel or deluxe size items being only half full.  But the product is awesome which is what matters the most, yes?  I love it, the smell is intoxicating and I have gotten nice compliments when wearing it. I am fully committed and have the shampoo and conditioner, the deodorant, the leave in spray hair conditioner, & full size everything on my wish list.  I want it all.

product_title: SOL DE JANEIRO Jet Set
Review Comment:
I needed a new fall fragrance & LOVE plum fragrances so I jumped at buying No.40, & I’m so glad I did. Since this brand is so popular with the younger folks I was worried it might smell a bit too youthful on my 37yr old self, but it’s actually perfect. It’s probably a bit mature of a fragrance for someone in their mid twenties or younger; I really doubt a HS girl would enjoy this unless she already liked heavier fragrances like Dior Addict etc.
As far as the fragrance, base notes tend to stay on my skin better than others but this dries down to a lovely balance between deep vanilla woods with smooth, velvety, slightly peppery plum with some lasting soft powder elements. It is so soft & lovely, almost like an oriental without the pronounced floral. It’s very interesting & subtle, I LOVE it & plan to buy the full sizes.

product_title: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes, Individually Wrapped Daily Face Wipes for Waterproof Makeup, Travel & On-the-Go Singles, 20
Review Title: great for travel and so cute
Review Comment:
first of all if you don’t use these wipes they’re great. non-irritating, durable, very soft on the skin. i know some of you are thinking, “why use makeup wipes when it’s so wasteful?” but personally i keep a normal size package of these by my mirror so when i’m doing my makeup and mess up i can use like 1/4 of a wipe (they tear easily) to fix it. so the regular size package has been lasting forever. i also use them to take off non-waterproof mascara because i personally think it comes off much better than using coconut oil, which is my method for waterproof mascara. and even then i only need 1/4 or 1/5 of a wipe. i know it sounds crazy, but if you’re like me and don’t wear a full face of makeup try conserving your wipes like that. seal them well or they’ll dry out because you’ll have them for so long.

anyway, because of all that these individually wrapped wipes are great. i haven’t needed to use one yet, but they’ll be great for emergency makeup fixes, spending the night at a friend’s, weekend trips, etc… i have one in my car and in a few of my bags/purses :)

product_title: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes, Individually Wrapped Daily Face Wipes for Waterproof Makeup, Travel & On-the-Go Singles, 20

product_title: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes, Individually Wrapped Daily Face Wipes for Waterproof Makeup, Travel & On-the-Go Singles, 20
Review Comment: Neutrogena's makeup remover wipes are awesome and this pack of individually-wrapped wipes is perfect for travel! I do a fair bit of in-home dog/pet-sitting, so I often spend weekends 'away' from home staying in other people's houses with their pets. Packing a travel bag all the time can be a drag (literally) and these convenient little packets ensure I can remove my makeup at the end of the day—without dragging extra bottles of face-wash/micellar water and cleansing cloths along. They are ridiculously convenient! These individually-wrapped wipes help with the 'less is more' mentality when packing. The wipes themselves are great and very effective at removing makeup without irritating my skin or leaving it feeling dry. I use them while traveling, house/pet-sitting and even at home when I don't feel like doing a more involved cleanse. I love & highly recommend these makeup remove wipes!

product_title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream | Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin | Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides | Daily Mo
Review Title: Creamy Thick but Not Greasy - Super Hydrating
Review Comment:
I recently received my jar. I almost didn’t order it, because it’s not a body butter and it isn’t scented. However, I saw it listed in a popular weekly magazine as one of the top 50 beauty products of 2024. I figured they must know something I don’t, so I gave it a shot.

First, it’s a healthy sized jar; you get a decent amount for the low price. When I opened the jar, I was doubtful that the lightweight looking cream could penetrate the dry skin on my legs, but I was so very wrong! I put about a teaspoon of cream on each leg, and my skin started absorbing it like I’ve never seen before. As I massaged it in, I felt a new smoothness emerge quite quickly. My legs have never felt this good to the touch in the last 20 years. It did not leave a greasy residue, yet it worked better than a heavy body butter. I couldn’t detect a scent at all. In the morning, my legs still felt just as supple as when I applied it, so it seems to have staying power. I decided to put some on my face, and I wasn’t disappointed. My flaky t-zone disappeared immediately with no shiny afterglow.

The hydration provided by this product is second to none! I will be buying this from now on for my body and face.

Review Comment: This CeraVe cream is a lifesaver! My skin feels so soft and hydrated without being greasy. It’s thick but absorbs quickly, so it’s perfect for day or night. I have sensitive skin, and this doesn’t cause any irritation at all. Plus, it’s fragrance-free and keeps my skin feeling smooth and moisturized all day. product_title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream | Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin | Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides | Daily Mo
Review Comment:
I’ve always struggled with dry, flaky skin, especially during the colder months. No matter what I tried, nothing seemed to help for long—my skin would go back to feeling tight and irritated after just a few hours. That is, until I came across CeraVe Moisturizing Cream.

At first, I wasn’t expecting much, to be honest. I’d seen it mentioned here and there, but I thought it was just another hyped-up product. Well, I was so wrong! The first time I applied it, I could feel an instant difference. The cream is thick but not greasy—it absorbed quickly and left my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and calm, without that oily layer that some moisturizers leave behind. And the best part? It lasted all day. My skin felt nourished and smooth from morning until night.

What really sold me was that it’s developed with dermatologists and contains 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid. These ingredients help to restore the skin’s natural barrier, which means it works long-term, not just as a temporary fix. Plus, it’s fragrance-free and non-comedogenic, so it doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin or cause breakouts.

I’ve been using it for months now, and honestly, I can’t imagine my routine without it. It’s become my go-to for both face and body, and I even carry a small tub with me when I travel. I’ve noticed that my skin is much healthier overall—less redness, more even texture, and just a natural glow that I never had before.

If you’re tired of dry, uncomfortable skin and want something that truly works, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is it. It’s affordable, effective, and backed by science. I recommend it to everyone I know, and now I’m telling you give it a try, you won’t be disappointed!

product_title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream | Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin | Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides | Daily Mo
Review Comment: I saw this cream advertised on TV and thought I should try it since I try everything hoping to get a moisturizing cream that really works on my lower legs and feet (I garden a lot and it leaves me with rough skin).  It works!  And, it lasts!  My skin feels moisturized even 4-5 hours later.  There's no fragrance (hallelujah!), and it goes on easily.  The cream's not thin (no drips), but not too thick and pasty either.  It's not greasy and doesn't leave foot prints in my leather shoes (if I wait about 15 minutes before putting them on).  I'm a fan now and will likely always have it available after a shower......

product_title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream | Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin | Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides | Daily Mo
Review Comment:
If you’re looking for a reliable, heavy-duty moisturizer that’s gentle on your skin, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is absolutely worth the hype. Here’s my take after using it daily:

1. Hydration Power:
This cream provides deep, long-lasting hydration without feeling greasy or heavy. I have dry, sensitive skin, and CeraVe’s formula keeps my skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. It’s especially great during the colder months when my skin tends to dry out faster.

2. Skin Barrier Support with Ceramides:
One of the best things about CeraVe is its ceramide-rich formula. The three essential ceramides work wonders to restore the skin’s natural barrier. I noticed a real difference in the texture and resilience of my skin after just a few uses—it feels smoother and healthier.

3. Non-Irritating & Suitable for Sensitive Skin:
It’s fragrance-free, which is a huge plus for anyone with sensitive skin or those prone to irritation. I’ve had issues with other creams that are too scented or harsh, but CeraVe has never caused any breakouts or redness. It’s also gentle enough for eczema-prone skin, and I’ve even seen dermatologists recommend it for this reason.

4. Texture & Absorption:
The cream is rich, but it absorbs well and doesn’t leave a sticky residue. A little goes a long way, so one tub lasts a good while, even with daily use on both face and body.

5. Versatile for Face & Body:
CeraVe is perfect for both face and body, so it’s a great all-in-one product. I use it on my hands, elbows, and anywhere that needs extra moisture, and it does the trick every time. It’s also a great base under makeup because it doesn’t feel oily.

product_title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream | Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin | Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides | Daily Mo
Review Comment: I think this is a great moisturizer that can compete with premier brands but won’t break the bank. I am 54 and have dry hormonal skin. I use this product as soon I have finished bathing/shower. I only dry my arm pits, under my breasts, and my nether regions. Apply this product while the skin is still wet, then throw on some pjs and let it continue to absorb. I throw on pjs because the product is quite thick and I don’t want it on everything—just my dry skin. If I’m having a lazy night, I also use it on my neck and face instead of my bougie products. It does not cause me to breakout, but it is thicker than I like for my face—personal preference. I live close to Canada—therefore it’s a game changer for my skin during long cold winters . Thumbs up all around!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment: I was kind of a hater before I ever tried the LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask, totally thought it was unnecessary and just a bunch of hype. I humbly confess I was wrong and now I am a fan and a believer!! I just purchased the the mini-jar set (five (5) flavors) of the LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask. I've used the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask just three (3) nights so far and I am pleased to report: NO MORE DRY, FLAKY LIPS. Believe the hype y'all!! I followed the instructions provided by another Amazon Customer and purchased the Burt's Bee Overnight Lip Treatment (purple/mauve lid) and I apply that as a basecoat over my lips. Then I apply the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask on top of the Burt's Bee lip treatment and, voila! Just three (3) nights and three (3) nightly aplications later, I happy to report that I finally have soft, flake-free lips - which is honestly a MIRACLE since I live in a very dry area and have to deal with dry, flaky lips year-round. (My lips were so flaky and dry that they'd often crack and bleed.) The Laneige lip mask isn't too heavy or greasy at all. I actually find the texture and "weight" on my lips to be very pleasant and light, even when I layer it over the Burt's Bee Overnight Treatment Mask. Also, as somebody with sensitive, blemifhs-prone skin, it has not caused me any breakouts aroud my lips. In terms of flavor/scent, so far I've only tried the Gummy flavor/scent out of the set and, unless you love flavor and scent of grapes, I wouldn't recommend that particular flavor/scent. The set does come with a small silicone applicator (as pictured in the promo photos), which I recommend you get separately if, for some reason, your Laneige purchase doesn't come with a reusable applicator. In terms of quantity and size, the mini-jars are tiny but each jar actually has a decent amount of product. I only use 1/3-1/2 of an applicator scoop and there is plenty of product to cover my lips. My guess is that each jar will probably last ~ 2-3 months? Finally, in terms of price, the mini-jar set is a steal and it's a small price to to pay for healing my ultra-dry lips. I'm so thankful that I now have a solution to keep my lips nourished, soft, flake-free all year-round. Highly recommend!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Title: Absolutely the ONLY product that has EVER worked for me!
Review Comment:
Let me begin by saying, I have literally tried EVERYTHING known to human kind for my extremely dry and cracked lips. As a person with systemic lupus and fibromyalgia, I’m used to battling a lot of health issues and chronic fatigue/pain. I drink a lot of water every day, yet I still deal with chronic dry skin and unfortunately, even worse, dry lips. It takes every ounce of willpower I have not to bite or pick at the peeling dry skin on my lips and peel it off which only results in my lips cracking open and bleeding. I have tried every single brand ranging from bargains to more expensive products available at every brick & mortar store, including lanolin products, and Burt’s Bee’s chapstick, which only seemed to make matters worse. O’Keeffe’s Lip Balm is the only thing I can use during the day that somewhat helps me. After reading all of the really great reviews for Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask, I decided to give it a try. I also noticed other people were leaving reviews who like me, previously had zero success no matter what they had tried before, were combining the Laneige WITH Burts Bee’s Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment. Thanks to their experimentation & taking the time to write extensive reviews, I was also able to ensure that I ordered a silicone applicator and both products! I put each product on every night before bed, & I put both on every morning before I leave the for work, and I carry them in my purse just in case I’m extremely busy throughout my day & not hydrating as much as I should be, just to keep my lips from getting super chapped. I know many people have expressed hesitation about the price point of the Laneige product for the size of the container. However, I would argue that there ARE MAJOR, valuable benefits, including the quality and longevity of the product. It’s truly a long term investment for your skin care. You actually don’t use very much AT ALL! It takes such a MINUTE amount to achieve the desired results. I received mine a few months ago and I have hardly used any of it. Sincerely, if you’re like me, and so many others, & have been struggling for a long time trying to find something that will actually help your dry, cracked, & peeling lips, this is the product to accomplish your goal! I highly recommend also getting the Burt’s Bee’s Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment with Ceramides (in the purple box) & get a silicone applicator, and go ahead and order a duo of the O’Keeffe’s Lip Balm for use throughout the day. Here’s my daily routine: After brushing my teeth and washing my face, using my silicone applicator, I apply the Burts Bee’s Overnight Intensive Lip Treatment, then I apply the Vanilla Laneige Vanilla (careful to avoid applying too much at the corners of my mouth, I have sensitive skin that is prone to break outs) In the mornings, I repeat these same steps again, pack both items into my small make up bag and place it in my purse and voilà
For the FIRST TIME IN MY LIFE, my lips are actually soft and healthy! THANK YOU LANEIGE! ❤️🫶

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Title: First Lip Product that does what it says!
Review Comment:
I decided to try this after seeing all of the social media hype about it. I have always had trouble with cracking lips, even though I am an exclusive water drinker and I don't go anywhere without my water in tow. Most lip products initially feel great but within an hour they will have my lips rough, cracking and covered in dead skin. It's so bad that I often use lip "moisturizer" products to exfoliate my lips. I apply the stuff, leave it on for about an hour, then use a paper towel to wipe it off along with all of the dead skin that it leaves behind.

This product is a polar opposite to the others. It does exactly what it says it does. It actually brings moisture into my lips and after wearing it for hours, it still won't leave me with dry lips. If you are like me and have found moisturizing lip products to be somewhat of a disappointment, do yourself a favor and try this one. It WILL NOT disappoint!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment: I actually ordered these because I didn't want to spend too much $$$ on a full-size Laneige container in a scent/taste that I didn't like. I shouldn't have worried, I love all of these! And Laneige Lip Sleeping Masks are Excellent. I just didn't realize just how incredibly small these little guys would be. They are seriously TINY! I don't have big hands or long fingernails, but there is no way, I can get my finger in these little jars. I guess that is all for the better to not put germs in them. Unfortunately, they only come with a single little spatula vs. five jars of lip masks. Fortunately, I bought a bunch of little spatulas and have more than enough for my lip mask collection.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment:
I have used this product for three days now and can tell my lips are slightly softer. The 1st day I put it on 20 before I went to bed.  This stuff is slightly sticky and does not absorb. If you are a side/tummy sleeper like me this stuff comes off on the pillowcase and onto to your face.
The 2nd day I wore it for 4 hours and had to wipe it off. It did not completely absorb. The 3rd day I wore it for 6 hours and still had a little bit on my mouth to wipe off. On the box it states to wipe off remaining product in your mouth in the morning. Unfortunately it wipe off in my pillowcase and can't wear it during sleep.
It also states to get the max benefit of the product needs to be used 8 hours each day for two weeks.
I can feel a difference in the softness of my lips just using it several hours for a couple of days. You do get a lot of product for the price,  but it does not absorb to be able to use it at night.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Title: Oh my, wish I had known about this stuff sooner!
Review Comment:
A former co-worker recommended this lip mask to me over a year ago and I finally bought some.  Now I wish I had bought some sooner!  An itsy-bitsy-teensy-tiny dab before bed is all it takes to wake up with soft, smooth lips.  I've even been putting some on the winter-weather cracks that are popping up on my finger tips and it seems to help them heal faster.
My only complaint (and it's pretty minor) is that the little applicator is difficult to remove from the plastic sleeve that holds it.  I've learned to not push the applicator all of the way into the sleeve and leave enough of the handle out to grab.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment: In the winter my lips get VERY dry! the cracking leads to wanting to peel and it’s just a mess, corners of my mouth get dry to the point of blistering- just over all not a good look. used this for ONE NIGHT, woke up with summer lips not winter lips LOL. so smooth, so soft. it’s like liquid iv for your lips. trust me it’s worth the extra price as i’ve tried many other solutions and they don’t fix my problem like this product does. also the cute little applicator makes it so fun for me!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment: I received the berry flavor as a gift in January 2024 and I use it nearly every night. I still haven’t finished it. A little goes a long way. My lips remain moisturized throughout the night and are moisturized in the morning. They are also much softer. I bought a replacement in July 2024, and still haven’t opened it. Worth every penny.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment: I've been plagued with dry lips my whole life. I always have lip balm on hand, literally walk around the house with one in my pocket, have one I my purse and office desk at all times. But I put it on at night and still wake up with dry lips. Until I found this baby. It's amazing. I have it on my nightstand, put a tiny amount on my lips (a literal dab will do) before I lay my head down and wake up with soft lips. A small applicator is included but I can't be bothered with that. A fingernail works just as well. Seems pricey but I ordered this almost a year ago and there's still plenty left (I don't use it as much in the summer) so it's absolutely worth the cost IMO. Give it a try and you won't regret it!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask: Nourish, Hydrate, Vitamin C, Murumuru & Shea Butter, Antioxidants, Flaky, Dry Lips
Review Comment: I love this stuff.  I wasn't quite sure what to expect, but I'm a lip balm junkie and find myself reapplying every time I wake up during the night.  I thought this might help with that, and I was right.  I generally don't like wand-application lip products, but this wand is actually better than most.  It's like a soft silicone that contours to your lips.  It stays put, smells great, and has a tiny bit of flavor (I got the eggonog one).  I really love it.  My lips don't feel dry all night long.

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment: What I love: I love that the color just makes my lips look like it's their natural color. Especially because regular lipstick looks bad on me no matter what. I love that the color stays for hours too, even through eating and drinking. I love that I can even put chapstick or gloss on top and it still stays put. What I don't like: I don't like that I have to wait 10-15 minutes to take it off. Sometimes I don't have that kind of time. It doesn't all peel off so I always have to wipe the rest off with a wet cotton pad. And it can get messy if I'm not careful. Don't want to end up making myself look like a clown. I also don't like that it's a little drying to my lips, but not bad. I just put aquaphor on top and that helps a ton!

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment: I really wanted to love this product. I've been looking for a lip stain that lasts and was intrigued after seeing a dermatologist influencer use this in a video. This is tricky to use because the formula isn't very smooth. It's easy to miss spots when lining the lips, which then looks silly because the stain does last for several hours. No matter how well I think I have exfoliated and prepped my lips, it's a 50/50 chance that it will apply evenly. If I use it all over (not just lining lips) the color migrates into my mouth and stains my teeth. I've somewhat solved this by putting vaseline on my teeth and inner most area of my lips (where they start to curve in towards my teeth)  to lessen the migration and staining, but then my lips don't take the stain evenly no matter how careful I am to avoid getting it on my outer lips. The color is pretty and it's a neat concept, but the formula needs some work to make it functional. Not sure if I would repurchase.

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment: I love Wonderskin but wanted a different color/better price so I thought I would try Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo.  The lip liner works as it says, easy to peel off, color stays and is true to the color featured online.  The only complaint is it is SO STICKY!  It is difficult to get a clean line as it sticks to itself and easily transfers if you go over a spot that already has product.  It is night and day different than wonderskins in terms of the sticky factor and the lines do not come out as crisp.  Love the color and staying power, hate the application.

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Title: Works! Muah-ve would look great on darker complected ladies
Review Comment:
This works like it's advertised, I just picked the wrong color for my lighter skintone. I purchased muah-ve and after peeling, it was very pigmented and dark, almost like a brown eyeliner. This would look great on someone who is darker complected, or maybe I can try it in the Summer. I've ordered p-inked to try next and I hope the different color is as pigmented as this one.

IT DOESN'T COME OFF and I tried taking it off because it wasn’t looking right on me! I was drinking coffee, drinking water and eating, but it was still on my lips. I put carmex on my lips all day as well, so it definitely stays. By the time I was getting ready for bed, it had come almost all the way off and that’s longer than any long lasting lipstick I’ve tried.

I also want to note that I can’t stand wearing lip stains because I do not like when my lips feel dry, but this didn’t feel like that.  It was nice to have more of a tattoo-like color, vs. something that dries down. I love that I was able to put on my carmex throughout the day like usual, but I still had the lip color.

Photo update: the smiling picture is mauve (it looks way darker in person) and not smiling picture is nooh-ed, which one is more my speed. I don’t have a picture of pinked, but it is so bright pink on me, almost fuchsia and I hated it 😂.

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Title: new makeup step added! love it
Review Comment: I saw this product being reviewed by an instagramer @ronyayvonne and had to try it myself. Its amazing I love what this does. I got it in the shade nOOHde, it adds color to my lips but not too bold. Its so easy to use and dries quickly, removal is easy as well. I just wait for it to completely dry and then pat my lips together and it starts coming off in one strip. I use this as a lip liner AND a full lip stain. I will never not need this! Ordering more!

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment: (I rarely ever do reviews) I got the color noodhde! And I’m probably going to order the color pinked!💕 I dislike lipstick because it never stays and it always gets on your teeth and this product has been on for over six hours, shown in the picture. And it’s still vibrant. It’s definitely worth the money! ( don’t put it on chopped lips, or even semi chapped, it will rip your skin) but other than that, it is literally perfect!😍💋

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment:
pros: i love the shades, the formula itself has no smell, and it can be considered smudge-resistant but is still flexible and works well for layering. surprisingly easier to apply than i expected.
cons: i wish it lasted all day as advertised, it's basically transferred onto the napkin after one meal ): any saliva or moisture will also cause it to stick to skin and teeth so just be careful!

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment:
I LOVE this lip liner. I have been using it for about 2 years now since it went viral on TikTok. The product itself is amazing. It lasts all day and works exactly how I want it to.
The only issue is the inconsistency in the product. I have ordered and re-ordered this item several times across both Amazon and TikTok. I have ordered 5 different shades, and I have bought the liners as a single and as part of a bundle. Every single tube I get has a different consistency, a few have had an odd smell, and some tubes seem to be literally empty upon first use. This most recent tube I ordered off Amazon, it took at least 10 “dips” into the tube to get enough product for a single application of it, and that was fresh out of the package. I have had other tubes like this before, and some seem to be completely full and feel like they last forever.
Love the product just wish it was a more consistent purchase.

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Title: Muah-ve 02- a bit dark and brown, no purple
Review Comment: This product is easy to use and has some serious staying power. However, the color is all wrong. Mauve, as the name suggests, typically is a pinkish-purple-brown. This is just brown. And a DARK brown on my pale, with pink undertone, skin. I only left it on for 5 minutes and, as you can see…it had a lot of pigment. So, I tried some on my hand and left it on for 30 seconds before wiping it off and it is much lighter. So, I plan to try that tactic with my lips. While it’s not mauve, it is still a very pretty brown if that is what you are looking for!

product_title: Sacheu Lip Liner Stay-N - Peel Off Lip Liner Tattoo, Peel Off Lip Stain, Long Lasting Lip Stain Peel Off, Infused with Hyalur
Review Comment:
This product + NYX lip pencil toffee= perfection (for my brown skin girlies)
At first I got the shade mauve and nude and it was too cool brown for my taste. I was looking for the perfect “just kissed” slightly red/ pink color. The color getting Redy is the best. This product is now the star of my everyday make up routine. The product last me through 75% of my 8 hr work day. Only down side is it can be a little messy to apply and you’ll have to do your lips first so the product can set(10-15 minutes). Try it! It’s its a great alternative to lipstick!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment:
I can’t say enough good things about the LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm! It’s an absolute gem and worth every penny. If you’re someone who struggles with dry lips or just loves a glossy, moisturized look, this product is a game-changer. First off, hydration—it’s incredible. The shea butter formula works wonders, leaving my lips soft, smooth, and plump all day long. No need to keep reapplying because a little truly goes a long way! Though, I have to admit, I like to layer it on a bit more because the glow is just that gorgeous.

The subtle tint is another highlight for me. It’s not overwhelming or super bold, but it gives just the right amount of vibrancy to bring my lips to life. It’s perfect for no-makeup days or as a finishing touch to a full face. The color is natural yet polished, making it my go-to product whether I’m running errands or heading out for dinner. And the scent? Heavenly! It smells so good without being overpowering—like a light fruity or floral fragrance that makes using it even more enjoyable. The lightweight, non-sticky texture is the icing on the cake. It feels luxurious on the lips without that heavy, greasy feeling some glosses leave behind. You can feel the quality with every application. If you’re debating whether it’s worth the price—trust me, it is. It’s one of those products you’ll keep coming back to. For me, it’s become an essential that I can’t leave the house without. Highly recommend! 🌟

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment: saw laura lee mention this gift set in one of her newer YT videos and ran here to get it. i love the peppermint/candy cane chap-stick that comes out every winter and i stock up when i can so i wanted to splurge on a "high end" version of it. i've been using this balm since the second it got delivered and am bringing the lip mask with me when i go home to the east coast for the holidays. crazy how a product can put you in the holiday spirit but this definitely does so for me! will be repurchasing again in the future or even as a gift for someone because i want them to love it as much as i do.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Title: I see what the hype is about
Review Comment:
Last year I wanted to try the Laneige sleeping mask in peppermint but by the time I got to it, they were sold out! So I tried another brand which was supposed to be comparable, but didn’t provide much relief. I have to say that I finally got the peppermint (my first time trying the line in general) and it is sooooo good. I live in a super dry climate, and am postpartum so my skin is crazy dry and upset.
 After one application, my lips feel relieved finally! It also last a long time even thru drinking coffee and water. I’m so happy with the results. Definitely buy into the hype.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment: nOt oNlY dOeS iT cHaP lIpS iT dOeSnT tInT😃but for real tho Lange is kinda good pros and cons like it barely tints and sometimes dehydrates but the smell is nice it has a little tint and most times it doesn’t dehydrate and actually gives a glossy look very nice

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Title: Secret Santa, Stocking Stuffer, Small Gifting
Review Comment: I bought one of these to try out to see if I liked it before I gifted them to my friends for the holidays. It’s a perfect little add on to gifts and it smells great and works even better. I do think personally it’s a little pricy but they are trending right now so I see why the price is so high.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Title: The one that started it all...
Review Comment:
This is my absolute favorite lip balm! I purchased this balm years ago when it first launched. I have repurchased it ever since, and it was the product that introduced me to the brand.

The balm is phenomenal. Its claims are spot on - it moisturizes and volumizes, and the balm's texture fills in the lip lines, giving your lips a more youthful appearance. It's a lip treatment as well because the feel and look of my lips have improved since I started using it.

It works wonders for NYC summers and winters - something truly impressive since I usually prefer different textures depending on the season. Laneige is light enough for the heat, and protective and moisturizing enough for the cold.

Although I enjoy using all the flavors, my most repurchased is the Berry one. The tint is subtle, but it does a great job at effortlessly perfecting and enhancing the look of your natural lip. I use it on bare lips usually, but they all also pair well on top of liner and lipstick.

I always thought that the original lip mask and the Berry balm were the same thing in different packaging, but they are not. The lip mask feels a little bit heavier with more emollience than the lip balm. Although the color looks similar, the balm has a more noticeable tint to it, while the mask looks clear once applied.

It's on the thicker side (when compared to other similar products), with a gel-like texture, however, it's not gloopy or sticky. It doesn't get stuck in my hair, and it also stays put - no bleeding outside the lip lines. Each balm smells like its designated flavor.  It has a pleasant barely-there scent that isn't overpowering. We all know that we end up ingesting a bit of whatever we put on our lips. The balm doesn't taste like anything. It's not sweet, but also not disgusting. It's something like a mild Aquaphor or Vaseline. Not something you'd really notice.

Laneige's balms & masks will continue to hold that holy-grail status with me for years to come. Highly recommend!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment: I absolutely love the LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm! The flavors are amazing—refreshing and not too overpowering, making it such a treat to use. It’s incredibly hydrating and makes my lips feel so soft and smooth, even in the driest weather. The formula isn’t sticky, so it’s perfect for all-day wear. Plus, the cute packaging makes it a fun addition to any beauty routine. This would make an awesome gift for teens this holiday season! It’s both practical and luxurious, and I’m sure anyone would love receiving it. Highly recommend!

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment:
Similar to the Laneige sleeping lip mask but lighter so it works as a daytime formula. I used to slug on the sleeping lip mask in the daytime, but it was super thick since it's made for overnight use.

This is the perfect remedy to that! Hydrating

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment: I love the Laneige lip mask and have recently been obsessed with lip balms so when this went on sale I snatched one asap! The berry is very similar to the berry lip mask, it's a little bit thinner but still very thick and glossy in comparison to other lip balms. I'm not even sure if there's a tint (although I think there is) because when I have this on my lips look super plump and pretty. I honestly regret not getting more when they were on sale. It lasts a long time, looks great, and keeps my lips super moisturized! I carry this everywhere I go.

product_title: LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm Hydrate, Glossy, Lightweight, Moisturize & Tint with Shea Butter
Review Comment: I recently tried the LANEIGE Lip Glowy Balm, and I’m really impressed! The texture is smooth and creamy, gliding on effortlessly without being sticky. It provides excellent hydration, leaving my lips soft and moisturized throughout the day. I love the subtle sheen it gives—perfect for a natural look. The flavor is delightful but not overpowering, making it a pleasure to use. Plus, the cute packaging is a nice touch! Overall, this balm is a must-have for anyone looking to keep their lips nourished and looking great. Highly recommend!

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Comment: I just tried this for the first time last night, it is very sticky so I put a t shirt over my pillow when I slept.  I have very sensitive skin, but this did not irritate me.  It's mostly dry the next morning, after I washed my face my face it felt super nourished,  fine lines are soften dramatically, skin is extra bouncy.  love it

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Comment: I rarely write reviews, but had to for the Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream because it works so well. I'm using it twice a day as the mfg recommends, after washing my face in the morning and at night. Within only 3 days there is a noticeable improvement in my skin texture and appearance;  skin is very soft, glowing and more even toned. I am 60 yrs old and overweight, so I can't attest to whether or not my facial skin appears more firm. But I'm delighted with the over all results and highly recommend. The formula is sticky, but a little goes a long way and absorbs in about 10 minutes is used sparingly. The product fragrance is light and pleasant, and I don't smell it after application. I'm now a devoted user!

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Comment: First off let me say my skin is sensitive and oily. Lots of redness around my cheeks, nose and chin. I use this every night (when I remember) as my last step in my nighttime routine-- trying to be consistent. And I love the way my face feels and looks in the morning. Depending on how much I sleep I can wake up a bit greasy side but that's just due to my face being extra oily. Less redness and I do not break out with it. My skin feels soft, plump and looks hydrated. I feel like this product will last for a couple months; a little goes a long way. The thickness of the gel is amazing. I will continue to use this product and hope it continues to be great for my skin.

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Comment: I use this in conjuction with the exisome shot. It's obviously very sticky and you leave it on overnight. I find that it gets itchy as it dries and it wakes me up. So now I put it on long before bed and then as it dries I finish it off with a moisturizer to make the drying process more comfortable. I'm not a fan of this method. But my skin is so soft in the morning when I splash it off with water that I'll keep using it.

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Comment:
My item came broken and so I decided to return it. I had to trav to California so didn’t have the time to return it and I decided to keep it put it in another jar and used it so it’s fine.
I love it how it works and makes my skin feels soft and not sticky I mainly used it at night when I go to bed. It cools me down and hydrates my face it observes nicely and for the price the value is grate.

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Title: Beautify hydrating and the texture is next level!
Review Comment: I was skeptical at 1st but one single I fell in love. A very little goes along way. You can use in a thin layer under makeup or thick for a overnight mask. I like to keep it refrigerated for that extra chill and it feel amazing. It hasn't broken me out and just left me with beautiful glowing hydrating skin. For reference I am 40 with textured acne prone skin. I will definitely recommend and repurchase! Beautiful product.

product_title: Medicube Collagen Jelly Cream- Niacinamide & Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen - Boosts skin's barrier hydration and gives 24h
Review Comment:
I was so excited to finally get this, and while it is exactly what you see in all the advertisements, because it smells good, you get a big amount for the price you pay, is easy to add to your skincare routine when using the device, and gives some glow afterwards...there's a few things to consider and are the reasons I rated the way I did. Again, this works well when using the device, but it is pretty thick and actually kind of sticky with it rating for 1-5 with 5 being very sticky, it's about a 2.5. If you're not using the medicube device, then it doesn't work very well as a conductive gel. I have other devices, and when I use this product with it, you can't feel the microcurrent....now if you don't like the feeling of microcurrent, then this is for you, but I like to know that something is working. Another thing is that it doesn't absorb very well...like if you're using the device, eventually it changes consistency, and at first I figured I'd leave it on...but now I prefer to wash it off, as the thickness would make it impossible for other products to absorb. I don't have sensitive skin, but I'm semi-prone to acne, and this hasn't caused me to break out, which is great, because otherwise I couldn't use it at all. With all these things considered, 3 stars seems appropriate.
I hope this review helps people understand exactly what to expect with this product and help you make the right decision for you. Happy skincaring!

product_title: Ear and Nose Hair Trimmer Clipper - 2024 Professional Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer for Men Women,Battery-Operated T
Review Comment:
This Zorami brand battery operated nose/ear hair trimmer replaces a cheaper tool that I had, and so far, I am very happy with it.

The main thing is, how well does it work?  For me, it works very well indeed for both nose and ears.

Given that the cutting head is small and round, you do have to develop a bit of a technique when using it. Tip: insert it, slowly rotate it and move it around a bit and listen while doing so -  you'll probably be able to hear when it's cutting hairs.

The features that like:

Seems nicely made for the price - battery end cap and clear blade cover are easy to grasp and fit on securely. Decent sliding power switch.

It's a good size, and fits comfortably in my medium/large sized guy hands. Not too small to drop, and it just does the one thing (there's no attachments) so it's not too big, either.

Reasonably quiet operation.

It uses a single AA battery.  Personally I prefer this over a rechargable.

My only concern is the case has a velvety rubber coating, and sometimes that type of coating can deteriorate and get sticky over time - I checked several of the one star reviews and no one mentioned this as an issue, so hopefully with careful storage the coating on this trimmer will stay nice like it currently is.

I will append my review as needed, but as I said, so far I am very pleased with this trimmer! :)

product_title: Ear and Nose Hair Trimmer Clipper - 2024 Professional Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer for Men Women,Battery-Operated T
Review Title: The Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer is a practical and convenient tool
Review Comment:
The Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer is a personal grooming device designed to offer a quick, easy, and painless way to remove unwanted facial hair. This trimmer is particularly popular for its precision in trimming eyebrows and removing fine facial hair, promising a smooth and hair-free finish without the discomfort associated with traditional hair removal methods like waxing or plucking.

Key Features
Painless Operation: The trimmer is designed to remove hair without causing pain, making it suitable for sensitive skin.
Precision Trimming: It features a precision head that allows for accurate trimming of eyebrows and other small areas of the face.
Gentle on Skin: The hypoallergenic blades are gentle on the skin, reducing the risk of irritation or redness.
Portable Design: Compact and lightweight, the trimmer is easy to carry in a purse or travel bag for on-the-go touch-ups.
LED Light: Some models come with a built-in LED light to help users see and trim fine hairs more effectively.
Battery Operated: The trimmer is typically powered by a single AA battery, providing convenience and ease of use.
Application
Preparation: Cleanse the face to remove any makeup or oils.
Trimming: Turn on the trimmer and gently glide it over the areas where hair removal is desired. Use the precision head for eyebrows and smaller areas.
Post-Trimming Care: After use, apply a soothing lotion or moisturizer to the trimmed areas to keep the skin hydrated.
Pros
Painless and Easy to Use: The trimmer effectively removes hair without pain, making it user-friendly and ideal for sensitive skin.
Compact and Portable: Its small size and lightweight design make it convenient for travel and quick touch-ups.
Precision: The trimmer's precision head ensures accurate trimming, especially useful for shaping eyebrows.
Affordable: Generally, this trimmer is an affordable option compared to other hair removal methods.
Cons
Battery Dependency: Being battery-operated, the trimmer requires periodic battery replacements, which might be inconvenient for some users.
Not for Thick Hair: The trimmer may struggle with very thick or coarse hair, as it is primarily designed for fine facial hair.
Regular Maintenance: The device requires regular cleaning to maintain its performance and hygiene.
Conclusion
The Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer is a practical and convenient tool for those looking to maintain smooth and hair-free facial skin without the pain associated with other hair removal methods. Its precision and gentle operation make it especially suitable for sensitive skin and delicate areas like the eyebrows. While it may not be ideal for thick hair and requires battery replacements, its overall effectiveness and affordability make it a worthwhile addition to a personal grooming routine.

Review Comment:
I recently acquired a new manicure set, and it has quickly become an integral part of my personal care routine. While it's near perfect, there's one small caveat, hence my 4.5-star rating.

The quality of each tool in this set is excellent. From the nail clippers to the cuticle pushers, each piece is made with care and precision, ensuring a clean and hassle-free manicure at home. The tools are sharp where they need to be, yet safe to use, making them perfect for both beginners and seasoned users.

One feature that stands out is the comfort and ease of handling. Each tool is ergonomically designed, allowing for precise control and reducing the risk of accidental slips or nicks. This quality craftsmanship extends to the case too. It's stylish and compact, ideal for both home use and travel.

However, it's this compactness that brings me to the minor issue I've found with this set. Given its small size, it's quite easy to misplace or lose, especially when traveling. If you're someone who tends to forget where they put things or if you're constantly on the go, this is something to consider. Perhaps attaching a brightly colored tag or a keyring could be a solution to keep track of it better.

That being said, this minor inconvenience doesn't detract from the overall excellence of the manicure set. The tools are durable and effective, making nail care a breeze. They've retained their sharpness and functionality even with regular use, a testament to their quality.

In conclusion, if you're in the market for a manicure set that provides professional-level care at home, this product is a fantastic choice. Just remember to keep an eye on it due to its small size. Despite this minor flaw, this manicure set stands out in the crowded field of personal care products and is certainly worth the investment.
